analyzed: atas eva dūṣitam kaustubhe vistareṇa upapāditam tatra eva draṣṭavyam
atas sūtra bhāṣya gata anumāna uktiḥ arthāpattiḥ eva
atas sā eva śruti mūla tva sādhane pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ

original: śrutimūlakatve siddhe sā śrutiḥ pratyakṣapāṭhenaivāvadhāritā manvādibhiḥ /
analyzed: śruti mūlaka tve siddhe sā śrutiḥ pratyakṣa pāṭhena eva avadhāritā manu ādibhiḥ

original: asmākamanupalambhastu svādhyāyādhyayanavākye svādhyāyapadamahimnā ekaśākhādhyayanasyaiva śākhāntarādhikaraṇe sādhayiṣyamāṇatvena śākhāntarādhītānāmadhyayanābhāvādeva
analyzed: asmākam anupalambhaḥ tu svādhyāya adhyayana vākye svādhyāya pada mahimnā eka śākhā adhyayanasya eva śākhā antara adhikaraṇe sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvena śākhā antara adhītānām adhyayana abhāvāt eva
adhyayanam vinā eva upāya antareṇa avadhāraṇe api tad tad deśīya puruṣa antara adhīta śākhānām pramāda ālasya ādi yuktaiḥ
puruṣaiḥ tad tad deśa gamanena śrotum api aśakteḥ upalambha ayogya tvāt eva na anupapannaḥ

original: ekaśākhādhītānāmapi ca śrutīnāṃ kratuprakaraṇagatānāṃ taddharmaṃ bādhitvā puruṣadharmasya
analyzed: eka śākhā adhītānām api ca śrutīnām kratu prakaraṇa gatānām tad dharmam bādhitvā puruṣa dharmasya
puruṣa dharma adhikṛtānām puruṣa dharma tva bādhena kratu dharma tvasya mantra arthavāda ādi kalpya vidhīnām
ca idānīntanaiḥ puruṣaiḥ nirṇetum aśakteḥ upalambha ayogya tvam

original: manvādīnāntu sarvajñatvena pratyakṣapāṭhenāvadhāraṇasaṃbhavāt pratyakṣapaṭhitaiva śrutirmūṃlamityabhipretyāha --- śrutiśceti //
analyzed: manu ādīnām tu sarvajña tvena pratyakṣa pāṭhena avadhāraṇa saṃbhavāt pratyakṣa paṭhitā eva śrutiḥ mūṃlam iti abhipretya āha  śrutiḥ ca iti

original: dṛśyante ca spaṣṭameva mantrārthavādāḥ pratyakṣapaṭhitā eva tattatsmṛtimūlam /
analyzed: dṛśyante ca spaṣṭam eva mantra arthavādāḥ pratyakṣa paṭhitāḥ eva tat tat smṛti mūlam
yathā yām janāḥ iti mantraḥ aṣṭakā smṛteḥ
yathā tarhi arthavādaḥ manuṣya rājaḥ āgatā iti asmin ukṣaṇam vehatam

original: vākṣadanta” iti arthavādaḥ --- mahokṣaṃ mahājaṃ veti smṛteḥ /
analyzed: vākṣa dantaḥ iti arthavādaḥ mahā ukṣam mahā ajam vā iti smṛteḥ
evam itarāsām api

original: evaṃ gurvanugamanādyācārāṇāṃ “tasmācchreyāṃsaṃ pūrvaṃ pāpīyān paścādanvetī“ti cayanaprakaraṇagatārthavādo mūlam /
analyzed: evam guru anugamana ādi ācārāṇām tasmāt śreyāṃsam pūrvam pāpīyān paścāt anveti iti cayana prakaraṇa gata arthavādaḥ mūlam
evam anyatra api ūhyam iti arthaḥ
smṛti praṇayana sārthakya upapādanam
teṣām śruti pratyakṣe smṛti praṇayana vaiyarthyam āśaṅkya nirākaroti na ca iti
arthavāda upoddhāreṇa iti

original: avidhisvarūpārthavādatyāgena vidhimātropasaṃhārasyedānīntanaiḥ kartumaśaktesteṣāṃ jñānārthaṃ tatpraṇayanasārthakyamiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: avidhi svarūpa arthavāda tyāgena vidhi mātra upasaṃhārasya idānīntanaiḥ kartum aśakteḥ teṣām jñāna artham tad praṇayana sārthakyam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu smṛti ācārāṇām śruti anumāpaka tvena upakṣīṇānām katham dharma adharma pramā janaka tvam
tasya veda eka gamya tvena tad gamya tva asaṃbhavāt
iti atas āha atas iti
evam ca tad prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ liṅga ādīnām iva bhāktaḥ

original: yattu --- bhāṣyakāreṇa prapākaraṇādismṛtīnāṃ paropakārarūpadṛṣṭārthatvena tathā gurvanugamanādyācārāṇāṃ guruprītirūpadṛṣṭārthatvena prāmāṇyamuktam,
analyzed: yat tu bhāṣyakāreṇa prapā karaṇa ādi smṛtīnām para upakāra rūpa dṛṣṭārtha tvena tathā guru anugamana ādi ācārāṇām guru prīti rūpa dṛṣṭārtha tvena prāmāṇyam uktam
tat vārtike eva nirastam draṣṭavyam

original: yāni ca pūrvoktāni dharmasthānāni teṣuca yastāvadṛṣṭor'thaḥ sa pratyakṣādimūla eva /
analyzed: yāni ca pūrva uktāni dharma sthānāni teṣu ca yaḥ tāvat adṛṣṭaḥ ṛathaḥ sa pratyakṣa ādi mūlaḥ eva
tatra yathāyatham dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojana vibhāgaḥ ākare draṣṭavyaḥ
vistara bhayāt na ucyate iti
iti prathamam smṛti adhikaraṇam

original: virodhe tv anapekṣyaṃ syād asati hy anumānam / Jaim_1,3.3 /
analyzed: virodhe tu anapekṣyam syāt asati hi anumānam

original: śrutiviruddhānāmapi audumbarī sarvā veṣṭitavyetyādismṛtīnāṃ śrutimūlakatvāviśeṣāt prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: śruti viruddhānām api audumbarī sarvā veṣṭitavyā ityādi smṛtīnām śruti mūlaka tva aviśeṣāt prāmāṇyam
na ca audumbarīm spṛṣṭvā udgāyet iti pratyakṣa śruti virodhāt tad anupapattiḥ

original: parasparaviruddhārthakānāmapi grahaṇāgrahaṇādiśrutīnāṃ bahuśo darśanena virodhe satyapi tatkalpane bādhakābhāvāt,
analyzed: paraspara viruddha arthakānām api grahaṇa agrahaṇa ādi śrutīnām bahuśas darśanena virodhe sati api tad kalpane bādhaka abhāvāt
tadvat eva vikalpena virodhasya pariharttum śakya tvāt ca
na hi atra pratyakṣa śrutyā smṛteḥ mūla ākāṅkṣā nivarttate
yena kalpanā mūla ucchedāt viruddha pratyakṣa śrutyāḥ liṅgasya iva smṛteḥ bādhaḥ syāt
na vā śaitya auṣṇyayoḥ iva atra viṣayayoḥ atyanta virodhaḥ

original: yena auṣṇyapratyakṣeṇeva śaityānumānasya prakṛte prameyāpahāralakṣaṇo bādhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yena auṣṇya pratyakṣeṇa iva śaitya anumānasya prakṛte prameya apahāra lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ syāt
na tu etat asti

original: vikalpena dvayoḥ saṃbhavāditi prāpte ---- bhāṣyakāreṇaivaṃ siddhāntitam ---- sarvatrānumāne
analyzed: vikalpena dvayoḥ saṃbhavāt iti prāpte bhāṣyakāreṇa evam siddhāntitam sarvatra anumāne
anumeya jijñāsāyāḥ kāraṇa tvāt pratyakṣa śrutyā ca sparśa vidhānena āveṣṭita tva rūpeṇa audumbaryāḥ
tathā pratyakṣa śruti virodha abhāve api yatra lobha ādi darśanam

original: yathā vaisarjanahomīyaṃ vāso 'dhvaryuḥ parigṛhṇātītyādau tatrāpi na śrutikalpanaṃ kḷptahetoreva mūlatvopapatteḥ iti /
analyzed: yathā vaisarjana homīyam vāsaḥ adhvaryuḥ parigṛhṇāti ityādau tatra api na śruti kalpanam kḷpta hetoḥ eva mūla tva upapatteḥ iti
virodhe tu anapekṣam syāt asati hi anumānam iti siddhānta sūtra gata tuśabda nirasanīya tvena
sūcita tad sūtra pūrvapakṣeṇa adhikaraṇa vicāram darśayitum udāharaṇam āha  śruti viruddhānām api iti
api śabdena yadi śiṣṭa traivarṇika parigraha anupapatti prasūta śruti mūlaka tvena manu ādi smṛtīnām prāmāṇyam

original: tarhi viruddhānāmapi āsāmuktahetorastu prāmāṇyam ityākṣepanirāsāt āpavādikī saṃgatiḥ sūcikā //
analyzed: tarhi viruddhānām api āsām ukta hetoḥ astu prāmāṇyam iti ākṣepa nirāsāt āpavādikī saṃgatiḥ sūcikā
ādi padena aṣṭācatvāriṃśat ityādi smṛti dvaya saṃgraha nirūpaṇam
ādi padena yathā audumbarīm spṛṣṭvā udgāyet iti pratyakṣa śruti viruddhāyāḥ sarva veṣṭana smṛteḥ udāharaṇa tvam

original: tathā “jātaputraḥ kṛṣṇakeśo 'gnīnādadhīta” iti śrutyā viruddhāyā “aṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣaparyantaṃ vedabrahmacaryami“ti smṛteḥ,
analyzed: tathā jāta putraḥ kṛṣṇa keśaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti śrutyā viruddhāyāḥ aṣṭācatvāriṃśat varṣa paryantam veda brahmacaryam iti smṛteḥ
tathā na dīkṣitasya annam aśnīyāt iti niṣedha apekṣita avadhi samarpikayā agnīṣomīye saṃsthite

original: yajamānasya gṛhe 'śitavyamiti śrutyā viruddhāyāḥ “krītarājako bhojyānna” iti smṛterapyudāharaṇatvaṃ saṃgṛhītam //
analyzed: yajamānasya gṛhe aśitavyam iti śrutyā viruddhāyāḥ krīta rājakaḥ bhojya annaḥ iti smṛteḥ api udāharaṇa tvam saṃgṛhītam

original: sadomaṇḍape udumbaravṛkṣasya kāṣṭhamūrdhvatayā yajamānasammitaṃ nikhanya sthāpyate /
analyzed: sadomaṇḍape udumbara vṛkṣasya kāṣṭham ūrdhva tayā yajamāna sammitam nikhanya sthāpyate
tat audumbarī śabdasya arthaḥ
vikalpena iti

original: virodhasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratyakṣabādhitatvena na śaityānumataṃ saṃbhavatīti
analyzed: virodhasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt pratyakṣa bādhita tvena na śaitya anumatam saṃbhavati iti

original: iha tu sparśanaveṣṭanayoḥ parasparātyantābhāvasamānādhikaraṇayoḥ prayogabhedena vikalpenaniveśasya saṃbhavāt yuktaṃ prāmāṇyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu sparśana veṣṭanayoḥ paraspara atyanta abhāva samāna adhikaraṇayoḥ prayoga bhedena saṃbhavāt yuktam prāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ
sarvatra iti

original: dhūmādidarśanānantaraṃ vyāptismaraṇe satyapi jijñāsābhāve 'numityanudayāt parokṣajñāne athavānumityarthāpattyoreva tasyāḥ kāraṇatvamityarthaḥ
analyzed: dhūma ādi darśana anantaram vyāpti smaraṇe sati api jijñāsā abhāve anumiti anudayāt parokṣa jñāne athavā anumiti arthāpattyoḥ eva tasyāḥ kāraṇa tvam iti arthaḥ
vaisarjana homīyam iti viṣaya antara gaveṣaṇa prayojanam atra
hetu darśanāt ca
iti pūrva sūtra anantara sūtram
tatra yadi pratyakṣa śruti mūlaka tva asaṃbhavaḥ
tadā smṛteḥ mūla ākāṅkṣāyām bhrānti ādi mūlaka tvam eva yuktam kalpayitum
tatra veṣṭana smṛteḥ udgātre dānena vastra lobhaḥ
aṣṭācatvāriṃśat brahmacarya smṛteḥ napuṃsaka tva pracchādanam
rāja kraya avadhi smṛteḥ bubhukṣā eva iti

original: saṃbhavaticedaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇamiti pauruṣeyatvādihetvantarapradarśanaparatayaikadā bhāṣyakāraḥ pūrvaśeṣatayā vyākhyāya adhikaraṇāntaraparatayā  #
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca idam dṛṣṭam kāraṇam iti pauruṣeya tva ādi hetu antara pradarśana para tayā ekadā bhāṣyakāraḥ pūrva śeṣa tayā vyākhyāya adhikaraṇa antara para tayā
pakṣa antareṇa vyācakhyau

original: tatra pratyakṣaśrutivirodhenaiva mukhyahetunā pūrvatrāprāmāṇyasiddhau lobhādihetoḥ dṛṣṭasyānvācayabhūtasya kathane prayojanābhāvenāparitoṣāt  #
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣa śruti virodhena eva mukhya hetunā pūrvatra aprāmāṇya siddhau lobha ādi hetoḥ dṛṣṭasya anvācaya bhūtasya kathane prayojana abhāvena aparitoṣāt  /
dvitīya vyākhyānam kṛtam
tat eva yuktam iti tad mate upapādayati tathā iti
vaisarjana homīyam iti

original: agnīṣomīyapaśoḥ tantre prakānte agnīṣomapraṇayanārthaṃ yajamānaṃ patnīputrān bhrātṝṃścāhatena
analyzed: agnīṣomīya paśoḥ tantre prakānte agnīṣoma praṇayana artham yajamānam patnī putrān bhrātṝn ca ahatena

original: vāsasā saṃchādya vāsaso 'nte strucamupanibadhya juhotīti śālāmukhīyāgnīdhrāhavanīyeṣu
analyzed: vāsasā saṃchādya vāsasaḥ ante strucam upanibadhya juhoti iti śālāmukhīya āgnīdhra āhavanīyeṣu

ādi padena yūpa hastinā udānam ācaranti iti smṛti antara grahaṇam

original: yūpo hastyate veṣṭyate yenetivyutpattyā yūpaveṣṭanārthaṃ vāso yūpahastipadasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: yūpaḥ hastyate veṣṭyate yena iti vyutpattyā yūpa veṣṭana artham vāsaḥ yūpa hasti padasya arthaḥ

original: tacca saptadaśabhirvāsobhiḥ yūpaṃ veṣṭayatīti veṣṭanavidhānāt vājapeyaṃ āmnātam //
analyzed: tat ca saptadaśabhiḥ vāsobhiḥ yūpam veṣṭayati iti veṣṭana vidhānāt vājapeyam āmnātam
evam bhāṣya matena adhikaraṇa dvayam vyākhyātam
tat vārtikakāreṇa dūṣitam

original: tathāhi --- pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe smṛtīnāṃ mūlabhūtaśrutyabhāvaḥ kiṃ sādhakābhāvāt bādhakasattvādvā /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyakṣa śruti virodhe smṛtīnām mūla bhūta śruti abhāvaḥ kim sādhaka abhāvāt bādhaka sattvāt vā
na ādyaḥ mahā ṛṣi praṇīta tva ādeḥ śiṣṭa traivarṇika parigraha ādeḥ ca itara smṛtiṣu iva iha api śruti sādhakasya aviśeṣāt

original: nāntyaḥ; viruddhaśrutidarśanarūpasya bādhakasya vrīhiyavādiṣu śrutiṣu bahuśo darśanena vyabhicārāt,
analyzed: na antyaḥ viruddha śruti darśana rūpasya bādhakasya vrīhi yava ādiṣu śrutiṣu bahuśas darśanena vyabhicārāt
viprakīrṇa śākhā antara gata śrutīnām asmat ādibhiḥ anupalambhe api manu ādīnām mahattara tvena anupalambha rūpa bādhakasya api abhāvāt ca

original: ataḥ parapratyakṣasyāpyātmapratyakṣasamatvāt taddṛṣṭaśrutīnāṃ mūlatvasaṃbhavānna bhāṣyakāroktaṃ sarvathāprāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati //
analyzed: atas para pratyakṣasya api ātma pratyakṣa samatvāt tad dṛṣṭa śrutīnām mūla tva saṃbhavāt na bhāṣyakāra uktam sarvathā aprāmāṇyam sidhyati
vārttikakāraḥ tu na jijñāsāyāḥ anumiti aṅga tvam
agni ādi ajijñāsāyām api tad udayāt
sati api vā tasyāḥ kāraṇa tve anumiti viṣaya śruteḥ jijñāsita tvāt ca
pratyakṣa śruti virodha abhāve vā lobha ādi mūlaka tva aṅgīkāre aṣṭaka ādi smṛteḥ api tad āpatteḥ

original: ataśca pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe 'pi smṛteḥ śiṣṭatraivarṇikaparigarhāviśeṣeṇa śrutimūlatvakalpanopapatteryuktameva prāmāṇyam,
analyzed: atas ca pratyakṣa śruti virodhe api smṛteḥ śiṣṭa traivarṇika parigarhā viśeṣeṇa śruti mūla tva kalpanā upapatteḥ yuktam eva prāmāṇyam
parantu yāvat śruti niścayam veṣṭanam na anuṣṭheyam

original: arthavādādyunnītavidhimūlakatvasyāpi smṛtiṣu darśanena prakṛte 'pi tanmūlakatvasya saṃbhāvitatvāttasya connayanasya pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ābhāsatvasaṃbhavāt
analyzed: arthavāda ādi unnīta vidhi mūlaka tvasya api smṛtiṣu darśanena prakṛte api tad mūlaka tvasya saṃbhāvita tvāt tasya ca unnayanasya pratyakṣa śruti virodhe ābhāsa tva saṃbhavāt
atas ca yāvacchruti niścayam ananuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam iti abhiprāyam sūtram iti prāha
veṣṭana smṛti mūla pratyakṣa śruti nirūpaṇam

original: kiñca jaiminiḥ svakṛte chāndogyānupade granthe --- “vaiṣṭutaṃ vai vāsaḥ śrīrvāsaḥ
analyzed: kiñca jaiminiḥ sva kṛte chāndogya anupade granthe vaiṣṭutam vai vāsaḥ śrīḥ vāsaḥ

original: śrīḥ sāmeti stotrīyāparigaṇanārthānāmaudumbarīṇāṃ prādeśamātrāṇāṃ kuśānāṃ sa ekayā
analyzed: śrīḥ sāma iti stotrīyā a parigaṇana arthānām audumbarīṇām prādeśa mātrāṇām kuśānām saḥ ekayā
sa tisṛbhiḥ saḥ ekayā ityādi viṣṭuti upākhya gata prakāra abhivyañjaka tayā viṣṭuti śabda vācyānām
sthāpana artham pariveṣṭayati iti śāṭyāyana śākhā brāhmaṇa gata pratyakṣa śruti mūla tvam eva

original: audumbarīprakaraṇe śāṭyāyanināṃ tāmūrdhvadeśenobhayatra vāsasī darśayatīti granthena
analyzed: audumbarī prakaraṇe śāṭyāyaninām tām ūrdhva deśena ubhayatra vāsasī darśayati iti granthena
darśitavān iti pratyakṣā eva śrutiḥ evam aṣṭācatvāriṃśat varṣa brahmacarya smṛteḥ api aṣṭācatvāriṃśat varṣam

original: sa vai vedabrahmacaryamiti rāṇakodāhṛtātharvavedapaṭhitā pratyakṣaiva śrutiśca mūlamityudāharaṇānyapyayuktāni //
analyzed: sa vai veda brahmacaryam iti rāṇaka udāhṛta atharvaveda paṭhitā pratyakṣā eva śrutiḥ ca mūlam iti udāharaṇāni api ayuktāni
aṣṭācatvāriṃśat iti smṛti mūla pratyakṣa śruti nirdeśaḥ

original: yathācātra virodho 'pi nāsti tathā ākare draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: yathā ca atra virodhaḥ api na asti tathā ākare draṣṭavyam
kaustubhe ca
atas na yuktam prathama adhikaraṇam

original: nahi “apivā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktānī“ti adhikaraṇena dṛṣṭamūlāsaṃbhavamātreṇācāraprāmāṇyaṃ sādhayiṣyate /

original: ataevoktaṃ nyāyasudhāyāṃ ---- udāharaṇabhāṣyamapi adṛṣṭamūlāvasthasmṛtiviṣayatayā netavyam iti //

veda karaṇa vedi karaṇa padayoḥ arthaḥ
pūrvapakṣa sādhakam śruti virodham darśayitum śrautaiḥ iti uktam
tam eva virodham darśayati nahi iti
vedam kṛtvā iti
vedaḥ nāma sammārjana sādhana darbha muṣṭiḥ
tasya karaṇam nāma bandhana agra parivāsana ādi saṃskāraḥ
vediḥ nāma gārhapatya āhavanīyayoḥ madhye catur aṅgula khātā bhūmiḥ
tad karaṇam nāma vedena sammārjanam uddhanana ādi saṃskāraḥ ca iti veda vedi karaṇa śabdayoḥ arthaḥ
ācamana ādīnām prayoga vidhi asaṃgraheṇa gauṇa krama virodha samarthanam
śruti bodhitaḥ iti
etat ca śruti artha pāṭha sthāna mukhya pravṛtti ākhya pāñcamika ṣaṣ pramāṇa gamya krama mātrasya upalakṣaṇam
artha ādi kramasya api prayoga vidhi vidheya tvāt
pratyakṣa śruta pradhāna vidheḥ eva aṅga vidhi eka vākya tā mātra kalpanayā prayoga vidhi vyapadeśya tvāt pratyakṣa śruti vihita tva avirodhaḥ

original: evañca smārtānāṃ kṣutādinimittakācamanādīnāṃ bhedena homavat vaidikaissaha kramaniyame
analyzed: evam ca smārtānām kṣuta ādi nimittaka ācamana ādīnām bhedena homa vat vaidikaiḥ saha krama niyame

original: padārthānāṃ vidhānāt tadbahirbhūtācamanādīnāṃ naiva prayogavidhisaṃbhava ityarthaḥ //

ādi padena agnihokrā aṅga sāyaṃprātar kālayoḥ api saṃgrahaḥ

original: yathaiva “pūrvāhṇo vai devānāmi“ti śrutyā pūrvāhṇakālo vihitaḥ,
analyzed: yathā eva pūrvāhṇaḥ vai devānām iti śrutyā pūrvāhṇa kālaḥ vihitaḥ

original: pradhānānāmaṅgānāṃ ca parasparaṃ pratyāsattilakṣaṇaḥ prayogaprāśubhāvalakṣaṇaśca kālo bodhyate /

parimāṇasya api prayoga vidhi avagama nirūpaṇam
prayoga vidhi avagatam ca iti
kim kaścid padārthaḥ vismṛtaḥ

original: kṛtaṃ vā sarvamiti sandehena vaiguṇyāśaṅkodaye “yadeva śraddhayā karoti tadeva vīryavattaraṃ
analyzed: kṛtam vā sarvam iti sandehena vaiguṇya āśaṅkā udaye yat eva śraddhayā karoti tat eva vīryavattaram
bhavati iti vacana avagata atiśaya phala janaka phala avaśyaṃbhāva niścaya ātmaka śraddhāvi rahāt
phala anutpatteḥ daivāt sakala vaidika padārtha anuṣṭhāne kṛte api saṃpūrṇa phala prāptaye
kṛta akṛta sandehasya avaśyāpaneya tvāt tasya ca anuṣṭheya padārtha saṃkhyā saṃpatti paryālocanam
vinā eva nirākartum aśakya tvāt prayoga vacanena śruti ādi viniyojyānām pracaya siddha iyattā vat avadhāraṇasya arthāt ākṣepam abhipretya avagatam ca iti uktam
tatas ca prathama avadhṛtasya parimāṇasya prathama a parikalpita paścāt āgata smārta padārtha anuṣṭhānena
bhraṃśāt punar tad kṛta akṛta anirūpaṇāt anivṛtta vaiguṇya āśaṅkasya samyak kṛta tva ādi nimitta saṃskāra pāṭava abhāvāt
apūrva daurbalyena nyūna phala lābha prasaṃgaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat uktam vārtike tat ca atiśayavat sarvam sārthavādāt vidheḥ gatam
nyūna tva akṣamayā avaśyam viruddhām bādhate smṛtim iti
aṅga guṇa virodhe ceti nyāya virodhasya pūrvapakṣe prasaktasya pariharaṇam

padārtha tvena pradhāna bhūta ācamana ādi anurodhena tad aṅga krama ādeḥ eva virodhe sati api

tat anūdya dūṣayati na ca iti
prathama avagatā iti

original: tena prathamāvagatena pramāṇabalābalenācamanādibhyaḥ kramādīnāṃ balīyastve nirṇīte nirākāṅkṣatvānna paścādavagataṃ prameyabalābalamādartavyamityarthaḥ

ācamana ādibhiḥ smārtaiḥ krama kāla ādeḥ avirodhena siddhāntaḥ

original: atraca “api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran” iti siddhāntasūtraṃ vārtikakṛtā

sūtra ārūḍham kartum teṣu adarśanāt virodhasya iti aṃśasya anuṣaṅgam kṛtvā virodha pradarśana para tayā
anuṣakta dvitīya avadhinā avatāritam

original: tatra virodhe satyapi prameyabalābalasya prābalyahetostuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyenopapādanīyatayā

original: tena ca bodhitaprayogavelāyāmeva padārthānāmapekṣitaṃ kramakālādi prayogāvacchedakatayā anvīyamānaṃ yāvatpramāṇaprāpitapadārthaprayogavirodhenaivāvacchedakatayā

pramāṇayoḥ aśva mahiṣa vat sva rūpeṇa virodha abhāvena viruddha prameya pramāpaka tvena eva

original: tasya pratīteḥ prathamaṃ pramāṇasvarūpālocane 'pi prameyasvarūpālocanaṃ vinā tadapratīteḥ

original: yadyapi vā prameyavirodhānusandhānottarakṣaṇe tadgatabalābalopasthitikāle viruddhaprameyapratipādakatvena pramāṇayorapi virodhopasthitiḥ syāt;

original: śiṣṭatraivarṇikaparigraho nāsati vedamūlatve 'vakalpate iti lobhādikāraṇābhāve smṛtivadeva vedamūlatvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śiṣṭa traivarṇika parigrahaḥ na asati veda mūla tve avakalpate iti lobha ādi kāraṇa abhāve smṛti vat eva veda mūla tvam iti arthaḥ

original: ata eva śrutismṛtiviruddhācaraṇeṣu satyapi dharmatvasmaraṇe mātulakanyāpariṇayādau śrutivirodhādeva virodhādhikaraṇanyāyena śrutimūlatvākalpanam
analyzed: atas eva śruti smṛti viruddha ācaraṇeṣu sati api dharma tva smaraṇe mātula kanyā pariṇaya ādau śruti virodhāt eva virodha adhikaraṇa nyāyena śruti mūla tva akalpanam

atas ca śruti smṛti aviruddhānām lobha ādi dṛṣṭa mūla tayā asaṃbhāvitānām sat ācārāṇām veda mūla tvam

original: ata eva smṛtau “śrutismṛtyaviruddho yassa sadācāra ucyate” ityuktam ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva smṛtau śruti smṛti aviruddhaḥ yaḥ sa sat ācāraḥ ucyate iti uktam iti arthaḥ

original: atraca sakalasadācāramūlabhūtāyā ekasyā eva śrutermūlatvakalpanaṃ athavā bhinnānāmityatra nirṇayaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca sakala sat ācāra mūla bhūtāyāḥ ekasyāḥ eva śruteḥ mūla tva kalpanam athavā bhinnānām iti atra nirṇayaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ

original: evañca aśabdarūpāṇāṃ ācārāṇāṃ ātmatuṣṭeśca mūlabhūtaśabdānumāpakatvena prāmāṇyaprayojakatve
analyzed: evam ca a śabda rūpāṇām ācārāṇām ātma tuṣṭeḥ ca mūla bhūta śabda anumāpaka tvena prāmāṇya prayojaka tve
smṛti adhikaraṇena siddhe api keṣāñcid śiṣṭaiḥ indra vasiṣṭha ādibhiḥ dharma vyatikramāt anuṣṭhīyamānānām
ahalyā gamana rūpa brahmahatyā upakrama rūpa sāhasa ādīnām api prāmāṇya āpattiḥ
tathā ātma tuṣṭeḥ api kasyacid jāyate tuṣṭiḥ aśubhe api iha karmaṇi
śākyasya vā ku hetu uktiḥ veda brāhmaṇa dūṣaṇe
paśu hiṃsā ādi saṃbaddha yajñe tuṣyanti hi dvijāḥ

original: tebhya eva tu yajñebhyaḥ śākyāḥ krudhyanti pīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ eva tu yajñebhyaḥ śākyāḥ krudhyanti pīḍitāḥ
śūdra anna bhojanena api tuṣyanti anye dvijātayaḥ
sva mātula sutām prāpya dākṣiṇātyaḥ ca tuṣyati
anye tu sa vyalīkena cetasā tat na kurvate
ityādi vārttika ukta rītyā anavasthita tvāt veda mūlaka tva asaṃbhavāt prāmāṇya anāpattiḥ iti āśaṅkām nirākartum āha vyatikrama iti
dharma buddhyā anuṣṭhāna abhāvena vyatikrama ādi aprāmāṇye api itareṣām sat ācārāṇām prāmāṇyam eva iti nirūpaṇam
indra vasiṣṭha ādīnām pūrva ukta ācaraṇasya śruti sāmānya mātrāt vā na doṣaḥ atra bhaviṣyati
manuṣya pratiṣedhāt vā tejaḥ bala vaśena ca
yathā vā na aviruddha tvam tathā tat gamayiṣyate

original: iti vārtikoktaprakāreṇa kaustubhādyupapāditena virodhaparihārasaṃbhavāt naiva viruddhatvam /
analyzed: iti vārtika ukta prakāreṇa kaustubha ādi upapāditena virodha parihāra saṃbhavāt nā eva viruddha tvam
dharma buddhyāḥ anuṣṭhīyamāna tva abhāvāt ca na sat ācāra tvam api
atas teṣām lobha kāma ādi rūpa dṛṣṭa mūla tvāt na eva prāmāṇyam
evam ātma tuṣṭeḥ api yatra tad mūla tva saṃbhavaḥ
tad viṣaye aprāmāṇye api śruti smṛti aviruddha ātma tuṣṭeḥ saṃbhavati eva tat
ataeva ātma tuṣṭeḥ dharma janaka tva sandehe nirṇāyikāyāḥ yat eva kiñcana anūcānaḥ abhyūhati ārṣam
tat bhavati iti vedena eva prāmāṇya abhyanujñānāt dharma tva jñāpaka tvasya smṛtau api ukteḥ
dharme jñāte jñāpaka tayā api prāmāṇyam avyāhatam eva iti arthaḥ

original: etena --- nityānumeyatvasya pūrvameva nirākaraṇāt pratyakṣaśrutyanubhavasya svasmin pratyakṣabādhitatvāt śrutyanumāpakatvāsaṃbhavāt aprāmāṇyam  #
analyzed: etena nitya anumeya tvasya pūrvam eva nirākaraṇāt pratyakṣa śruti anubhavasya svasmin pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt śruti anumāpaka tva asaṃbhavāt aprāmāṇyam
iti nirastam
yat eva iti śruteḥ eva pratyakṣa paṭhitāyāḥ icchā viṣayasya dharma tva bodhikāyāḥ svasya anubhava saṃbhavena tad mūlaka tva upapatteḥ
atra mata antara nirāsaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ
iti caturtham ācāra prāmāṇya adhikaraṇam

original: teṣv adarśanād virodhasya samā vipratipattiḥ syāt / Jaim_1,3.8 /
analyzed: teṣu adarśanāt virodhasya samā vipratipattiḥ syāt
teṣu adarśanāt
atra śabda prayoga rūpasya ācārasya yatra ārya mlecchayoḥ parasparam artha vipratipattiḥ
yathā pīlu śabdasya vṛkṣa viśeṣe āryāṇām hastini anyeṣām
tatra tayoḥ tulya bala tvam
vyavahāre āryāṇām iva mlecchānām api abhiyukta tva aviśeṣāt
avadhya smaraṇasya ubhayatra api samāna tvāt ca iti prāpte śakyatā avacchedaka bhedena aneka śakti kalpanā prasaṅgāt ekatra eva śaktiḥ na ubhayatra
na ca vinigamanā virahaḥ
ārya prasiddheḥ eva niyāmaka tvāt
āryāḥ hi śabda eka samadhigamya dharma adharmayoḥ avipluti lipsayā śabda artha tattvam vivicya paripālayanti
na mlecchāḥ
dṛṣṭārtha vyavahārasya yathā kathañcid api siddheḥ
atas tad prasiddhyā vṛkṣa viśeṣaḥ eva śaktiḥ
gaja pratītiḥ tu lakṣaṇayā śakti bhramāt vā
yatra tu niyāmaka abhāvaḥ tatra āgatya akṣa ādi śabdeṣu ubhayatra api śaktiḥ
āryāṇām eva ubhayatra prayogāt

original: tatrāpi kvacidvākyaśeṣasya niyāmakatā --- yathā “yatrānyā oṣadhayo mlāyante athaite modamānā ivottiṣṭhantī“tyanena yavaśabdasya dīrghaśūka  #
analyzed: tatra api kvacid vākyaśeṣasya niyāmaka tā yathā yatra anyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ mlāyante atha ete modamānāḥ iva uttiṣṭhanti iti anena yava śabdasya
eva śaktiḥ
priyaṅguṣu tulakṣaṇādiḥ iti
iti pañcama adhikaraṇe ārya prasiddhi niyāmaka tā param prathama varṇakam
teṣu adarśanāt iti sūtre bhāṣyakṛt racita adhikaraṇa śarīra saṃgrahaḥ
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākaraṇa adhikaraṇe sādhu śabda prayoga niyama smṛteḥ veda mūla tva abhidhānāt anādi vācaka ākhya sādhu
śabda prayogasya dharma buddhyā anuṣṭhīyamāna tva aviśeṣāt sādhu śabda prayogasya sākṣāt dharma tayā
tad antar varti padānām padārtha pratipatti mukhena dharma adharma upayogi tayā dharma prāmāṇya saṃbhavena
dharma pramāṇa jijñāsā upapatteḥ adhyāya saṃgatim
śiṣṭa ākopa adhikaraṇe smṛti adhikaraṇa siddha smṛti ācāra prāmāṇyasya virodha adhikaraṇena āpāditasya
pratiprasava karaṇena ācāra prāmāṇyasya api prastuta tvāt anantara saṃgatim ca abhipretya yatra

original: “yavamayaścaruḥ” “vārāhī upānahau” “vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān saṃcinoti” ityādau prayuktānāṃ
analyzed: yava mayaḥ caruḥ vārāhī upānahau vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān saṃcinoti ityādau prayuktānām

yathā bahubhiḥ yava ādi śabdāḥ priyaṅgu vāyasa jambu vṛkṣeṣu prayujyante
kaiścid tu dīrgha śūka sūkara vañjuleṣu
tatra prayoga pratyayayoḥ ubhayatra aviśeṣāt ubhayatra vācaka tva kalpanena artha dvayasya api

original: atra ca vākyaśeṣasya sattvepyanyatrāśvavālādau śaktigrāhakatve yavādiśabdasthale tanniścāyakatvamātrameva lāghavāt kalpyate /

original: gavāmadyatvabuddhyā khecaravāyasānudhāvanāsaṃbhavena jambūvṛkṣasya sthalādhikaraṇasya apsujanyatvasyāsaṃbhavena tadanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: gavām adya tva buddhyā khecara vāyasa anudhāvana asaṃbhavena jambu vṛkṣasya sthala adhikaraṇasya apsu janya tvasya asaṃbhavena tad anupapatteḥ

original: deśe śiṣṭairaprayogāt vipratipattyabhāvena “sārasvataṃ meṣa” mityatra “vāgvai sarasvatī“ti
analyzed: deśe śiṣṭaiḥ aprayogāt vipratipatti abhāvena sārasvatam meṣam iti atra vāc vai sarasvatī iti

na udāharaṇa tva saṃbhavaḥ

atas bhāṣya kāra iyām adhikaraṇa racanām ayuktām matvā pika nema adhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇa mleccha prayoga ācāra prāmāṇya ālocanena
prāsaṅgikīm saṃgatim ca abhisaṃdhāya ārya mleccha vipratipatti viṣaya śabda prayoga rūpa ācāra udāharaṇena api
ārya prasiddheḥ balīyaḥ tvam siddhāntitam

original: tadvadeva bhāṣyakāra kṛtaṃ vicāraṃ svayamapyupekṣya yathāvārtikameva vicāraṃ darśayati --- tatreti //

original: dharmatvena śiṣṭatraivarṇikaparigrahasya śrutikalpakatvasyobhayatra tulyatvāt vikalpena prāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣamāha --- tatrobhayoriti //

etat ca tulya bala tvam samā vipratipattiḥ syāt iti sūtra anurodhena uktam

api yathāśruta mūla niścayāt ananuṣṭhāna rūpa phala apahāra lakṣaṇa bādhasya iva iha smṛti virodhe
anuṣṭhāna ātmakasya ācārasya phala apahāra lakṣaṇasya bādhasya asaṃbhavāt smṛteḥ vākya ātmaka tvena
pratyakṣa śruti aviruddha artha pratipādaka śruti kalpanena yathāśruta artha tyāga lakṣaṇa bādha saṃbhave
api iha ācārāṇām a vākya ātmaka tvena anyathātvasya api kalpayitum aśakya tvāt tad asaṃbhave mithyātva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--- manvādīnāṃ “sākṣātkṛtadharmāṇa ṛṣaya” iti smṛteḥ sakalatattvajñānasaṃpannatvāt

original: ācārasya tu manvādigatasya asmadādibhiḥ anupalaṃbhādarvācīnānāṃ ca sakaladharmatattvajñānābhāvāt
analyzed: ācārasya tu manu ādi gatasya asmat ādibhiḥ anupalaṃbhāt arvācīnānām ca sakala dharma tattva jñāna abhāvāt

smṛti virodhe api bhavati eva anuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇa phala apahāra rūpa bādha saṃbhavena pratibandhaḥ

original: śiṣṭācāro hi pūrvapūrvācāryagatassannuttarottarān prati svakartavyatāṃ pramāpayan svānuṣṭhānaphalakatayā prāmāṇyaṃ labhate /
analyzed: śiṣṭa ācāraḥ hi pūrva pūrva ācārya gataḥ san uttarottarān prati sva kartavya tām pramāpayan sva anuṣṭhāna phalaka tayā prāmāṇyam labhate
saṃbhavati ca tasya uttara uttara anuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇa phala apahārāt bādhaḥ
ācārasya śruti kalpane smṛti apekṣayā viprakarṣa nirūpaṇam
kiñca ācārasya nitya anumeya śruti mūlaka tva nirāsāt pratyakṣa anubhūta śruti mūla tvam kalpanīyam
na ca idānīntanānām anuṣṭhātṝṇām itas tatas viprakīrṇa śākhā antara gata śruti darśanam saṃbhavati

original: ator'vācīnācārān dṛṣṭvā na jhaṭityeva śrutiviṣayānubhavakalpanam bādhitatvāt iti
analyzed: atas avācīna ācārān dṛṣṭvā na jhaṭityā iva śruti viṣaya anubhava kalpanam bādhita tvāt iti
manu ādibhyaḥ manu ādi upadeśena eva ādya yāvat arvācīna paryantam etad ācāra anuṣṭhāna kalpanam iti
śruti adhigama kalpanam yāvat anuṣṭhānam iti manu ādeḥ anuṣṭhāna darśanena vā adya tad anuṣṭhāna darśana kalpanam
vā manu ādibhiḥ tu param etad ācāra mūla śrutiḥ dṛṣṭā iti kalpyate

original: ato manvādibhirevaitadācāramūlaṃ śrutimupalakṣya smṛtvā tadānīntanebhya upadiśya
analyzed: atas manu ādibhiḥ eva etad ācāra mūlam śrutim upalakṣya smṛtvā tadānīntanebhyaḥ upadiśya

original: tadānīntanaireva vā manvādyācāraṃ dṛṣṭvā anuṣṭhitaṃ ityevaṃ paramparayādyayāvadarvācīnācāraparyantaṃ
analyzed: tadānīntanaiḥ eva vā manu ādi ācāram dṛṣṭvā anuṣṭhitam iti evam paramparayā ādya yāvat arvācīna ācāra paryantam

original: ācārānuṣṭhānamityevaṃ pūrvapūrvācārakalpanayā smṛtiṃ prakalpya paścāt śrutikalpanamiti
analyzed: ācāra anuṣṭhānam iti evam pūrva pūrva ācāra kalpanayā smṛtim prakalpya paścāt śruti kalpanam iti

manu ādi nibaddha smṛtīnām tu manu ādiṣu eva śruti upalaṃbha pūrvakam tad artha smṛti kalpanena

original: nibandhanopapatterarthakalpanadvārā jhaṭityeva śrutikalpanāt sannikarṣa iti liṅgavākyādivadevārthaviprakarṣādapyācārasya daurbalyam //
analyzed: nibandhana upapatteḥ artha kalpana dvārā jhaṭiti eva śruti kalpanāt sannikarṣaḥ iti liṅga vākya ādi vat eva artha viprakarṣāt api ācārasya daurbalyam
evam vā yatra mātula kanyā pariṇaya ādau smṛti ācārayoḥ virodhaḥ tatra ubhayoḥ api

original: śrutikalpakatvāttulyabalatva- miti prāpte --- smṛtīnāṃ sapratyayapraṇītatvāt smṛtiṣu
analyzed: śruti kalpaka tvāt tulya bala tvam iti prāpte smṛtīnām sa pratyaya praṇīta tvāt smṛtiṣu

śruti avagamasya aśakya tvāt kartavya tā vāci vidhi pratyayasya avaśya kalpanīya tvāt ca daurbalyam

original: ataevedānīntanācāra- darśanena śrutidraṣṭuḥ smṛtiṃ tadupadeśaṃ vā kalpayitvā śrutikalpanam,
analyzed: ataeva idānīntana ācāra darśanena śruti draṣṭuḥ smṛtim tad upadeśam vā kalpayitvā śruti kalpanam

iti pañcama adhikaraṇe smṛti viruddha ācārā prāmāṇya param dvitīya varṇakam

yadi api katipaya ācāra mūla bhūta śrutīnām arvācīnānām darśanam bhavati

original: yathā “nayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ dīkṣitaḥ pūrvamaṅkte savyaṃ hi manuṣyā āñjate” iti śrutermanuṣyakartṛkaprāksavyākṣyañjanācāramūlabhūtāyāḥ,
analyzed: yathā nayanam dakṣiṇam dīkṣitaḥ pūrvam aṅkte savyam hi manuṣyāḥ āñjate iti śruteḥ manuṣya kartṛka prāc savya akṣi añjana ācāra mūla bhūtāyāḥ
evam anyāḥ api śrutayaḥ udāhartavyāḥ
tathā api para prakaraṇa paṭhita tva vidhi anta śeṣa tva ādinā idānīntanaiḥ tāsām ācāra mūla tva anadhyavasānāt ācāra paraṃparayā manu ādi niṣṭha adhyavasāya kalpanam āvaśyakam eva
kiñca ācāre kartavyasya svarūpa mātram kḷptam
na tu kartavya tā
sā tu dharma buddhi ādinā artha sukha ādi rūpa hetu antara asaṃbhava pariśeṣa sahakṛtayā kalpyā

original: smṛtau tu liṅādiśabdenaiva sāvagamyate iti vaiṣamyāt prakṛte śrutivirodharūpabalavadbādhakabalādanupalabhyamānamapi
analyzed: smṛtau tu liṅ ādi śabdena eva sā avagamyate iti vaiṣamyāt prakṛte śruti virodha rūpa balavat bādhaka balāt anupalabhyamānam api

original: kāmādihetvantaraṃ sphuṭatarameva kasyacinmūlānuṣṭhātuḥ puṃsa iti pariśeṣāsaṃbhavena
analyzed: kāma ādi hetu antaram sphuṭataram eva kasyacid mūla anuṣṭhātuḥ puṃsaḥ iti pariśeṣa asaṃbhavena

original: anyeṣāmapi tadanuyāyināmadharma eva dharmabuddhiriti niṣpramāṇakaṃ tanmūlaśrutikalpanam //
analyzed: anyeṣām api tad anuyāyinām adharmaḥ eva dharma buddhiḥ iti niṣpramāṇakam tad mūla śruti kalpanam
vikalpa āpattyā api niṣiddha viṣayaka ācāra ādeḥ śruti kalpaka tva ayogaḥ
kiñca smṛti mūla śrutyā niṣedha rūpayā mātula kanyā pariṇaya ādeḥ pratyavāya janaka tva bodhanāt
ācāra mūla śrutyāḥ iṣṭa sādhanatva bodhanasya vastuni vikalpa ayogena ekasya eva tad ubhaya virodhaḥ

original: ṣoḍaśigrahaṇaniṣedhena tu ṣoḍaśigrahaṇābhāve 'pītarāṅgaiḥ kratūpakārasiddherevākṣepāt yukto vikalpaḥ //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśigrahaṇa niṣedhena tu ṣoḍaśigrahaṇa abhāve api itara aṅgaiḥ kratu upakāra siddheḥ eva ākṣepāt yuktaḥ vikalpaḥ
ātma tuṣṭeḥ śruti mūla tva śaṅkā nirākaraṇa pūrvakam smṛti ācāra mūla tva vyavasthāpanam
evam ātma tuṣṭeḥ api smṛti virodhe daurbalyāt aprāmāṇyam avaseyam

original: yadyapi caruśabde yājñikaprasiddhyā lokaprasiddherbādhādeva nirṇayassaṃbhavatīti na vākyaśeṣamātranirṇeyābhiprāyatvam;
analyzed: yadi api caru śabde yājñika prasiddhyā loka prasiddheḥ bādhāt eva nirṇayaḥ saṃbhavati iti na vākyaśeṣa mātra nirṇeya abhiprāya tvam
tathā api kvācitka yājñika prasiddheḥ eva lākṣaṇika tva upapattyā bahutara tad prasiddhi bādhā ayogāt

original: vākyaśeṣasyaiva yājñikaprasiddhimūlatvenāṅgīkāryatve “taddhetoreve“ti nyāyena nirṇāyakatvam iti dhyeyam //
analyzed: vākyaśeṣasya eva yājñika prasiddhi mūla tvena aṅgīkārya tve tad hetoḥ eva iti nyāyena nirṇāyaka tvam iti dhyeyam

aśva vālānām eva kāśa rūpeṇa pariṇāma abhidhānāt prakṛti vikārayoḥ ca salakṣaṇa tva dīrgha tva ādinā
sādṛśyena yadi api gauṇaḥ prayogaḥ saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi sarvatra vākyaśeṣābhāve 'pi śyenaśabda iva pūrvoktarītyā grahaṇaṃ yuktam /

original: vastutastu --- aśvavālaśabdasya gauṇatvābhyupagame gauṇatāyāḥ padāntarasāmānādhikaraṇyasāpekṣatvena asāmarthyāpatteḥ āśvavāla iti taddhitānutpattiprasaṃgāt  #
analyzed: vastutas tu aśvavāla śabdasya gauṇa tva abhyupagame gauṇa tāyāḥ pada antara sāmānādhikaraṇya sāpekṣa tvena asāmarthya āpatteḥ āśvavālaḥ iti taddhita anutpatti prasaṃgāt
na eva gauṇa tvam

original: apitu vaidikaprasiddhyā balīyasyāvayavārthaprasiddhibādhāt aśvakarṇaśabda ivakāśeṣu rūḍhyavagamādiha śakyārthasyaiva grahaṇe 'pi avayavayogenāpi  #
analyzed: apitu vaidika prasiddhyā balīyasyā avayava artha prasiddhi bādhāt aśvakarṇa śabdaḥ iva kāśeṣu rūḍhi avagamāt iha śakya arthasya eva grahaṇe api avayava yogena api
śakti avadhāraṇāt nānārtha tvam eva

original: tat na; tasya vākyaśeṣānvayātprāk sandigdhārthaviṣaye nirṇāyakatve 'pi iha tadanvayātprāk viparītārthaniścayena sandigdhārthatvābhāvena anirṇāyakatayāpravṛtteriti
analyzed: tat na tasya vākyaśeṣa anvayāt prāk sandigdha artha viṣaye nirṇāyaka tve api iha tad anvayāt prāk viparīta artha niścayena sandigdha artha tva abhāvena anirṇāyaka tayā apravṛtteḥ iti

nemaḥ arddham
satam bṛhat patram dāru mayam śata chidram parimaṇḍalam

original: tatra tatprasiddhārthasyaiva grahaṇaṃ na tu nigamaniruktādinā tatkalpanam /

pika ādi śabdānām vedaḥ eva dṛśyamāna tvena avipluta tvāt

original: ataśca teṣāṃ vācyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatprasiddherapi kḷptatayā grāhakatvam /
analyzed: atas ca teṣām vācya ākāṅkṣāyām tad prasiddheḥ api kḷpta tayā grāhaka tvam

original: ataeva nigamādiprasiddherapi tatprasiddhitvena prābalye 'pi kalpyatvena daurbalyam /
analyzed: ataeva nigama ādi prasiddheḥ api tad prasiddhi tvena prābalye api kalpya tvena daurbalyam
mleccha prasiddheḥ ca mleccha prasiddhi tvena daurbalye api kṷpta tvena prābalyam
pramāṇa bala abala apekṣayā prameya bala abala balīyaḥ tvasya sthāpita tvāt
ataeva na atra viśeṣataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ kathitaḥ
iti pika nema adhikaraṇam
atra yadi api bhāṣye ārya mleccha prasiddheḥ balābala cintā bhāti

original: tathāpi sā mlecchaprasiddheḥ kvacidapi prāk prāmāṇyasyānirūpaṇādayukteti matvā prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyacintaivātra kriyate /
analyzed: tathā api sā mleccha prasiddheḥ kvacid api prāk prāmāṇyasya anirūpaṇāt ayuktā iti matvā prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya cintā eva atra kriyate
balābala cintā tu śiṣṭa ākopa adhikaraṇe vyutpādita pramāṇa balābala nyāyena eva siddhā prasaṃgāt

original: phalībhūtatvena darśiteti vārtikasūcitamabhipretya virodhe mlecchaprasiddheḥ daurbalye
analyzed: phalībhūta tvena darśitā iti vārtika sūcitam abhipretya virodhe mleccha prasiddheḥ daurbalye

original: 'pi avirodhe tasyā eva pramāṇatvena grahaṇāt niruktādidvārakaśāstraprasiddhessiddhānte
analyzed: api avirodhe tasyāḥ eva pramāṇa tvena grahaṇāt nirukta ādi dvāraka śāstra prasiddheḥ siddhānte

original: niryuktikatayā ca tāmapradarśyaiva viṣayapradarśanapūrvakaṃ siddhāntamāha --- yatreti /
analyzed: niryuktika tayā ca tām a pradarśya eva viṣaya pradarśana pūrvakam siddhāntam āha yatra iti

original: ādipadena paśvavayavaviśeṣavācināṃ klomādiśabdānāṃ dhautakauśeyavācinaḥ patrorṇaśabdasya kañcukavācino vārabāṇaśabdasya ca saṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: ādi padena paśu avayava viśeṣa vācinām kloma ādi śabdānām dhauta kauśeya vācinaḥ patra ūrṇa śabdasya kañcuka vācinaḥ vārabāṇa śabdasya ca saṃgrahaḥ
kāśa ādiṣu sādhita apramāṇa bhāva mleccha prasiddheḥ agrahaṇāt nāryāṇām iti uktam

original: āryeṣvarthaviśeṣaprasiddheḥ svarūpato 'sattve 'pi tanmūlatvenāsiddhāyā api niruktādinā sādhayituṃ śakyatvāt tasyāṃ prayoktṛbalīyastvaṃ svarūpeṇa  #
analyzed: āryeṣu artha viśeṣa prasiddheḥ svarūpataḥ asattve api tad mūla tvena asiddhāyāḥ api nirukta ādinā sādhayitum śakya tvāt tasyām prayoktṛ balīyaḥ tvam svarūpeṇa
balīyaḥ tvam

original: mlecchaprasiddhau tu prayoktṛdaurbalyaṃ svarūpeṇa daurbalyamitisandehakāraṇamapākurvan niścayaṃ darśayati --- tatra tatprasiddhārthasyeti //
analyzed: mleccha prasiddhau tu prayoktṛ daurbalyam svarūpeṇa daurbalyam iti sandeha kāraṇam apākurvan niścayam darśayati tatra tad prasiddha arthasya iti
tathā ca mleccha prasiddheḥ eva abhidheya nirṇaye prāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ
pika ādi śabdānām iti
śabda antareṣu vipluti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa aśaktau api pikam ālabheta somāpauṣṇam carum nirvapet nema piṣṭam
paśu kāmaḥ ityādi vaidika codanāsu pika ādi śabdānām prayukta tvena avibhaktika mleccha prayoge
api prātipadika mātrasya avipluti niścayāt nitya veda prayukta tvena ca jāti ādi rūpa nitya artha vāci tva kalpanā avaśyaṃbhāve

original: sati mukhyārthāntarāprasiddhyā tatsadṛśe kokilādau gauṇatvāyogāt svasamānārthakakokilādiśabdāsādṛśyācca
analyzed: sati mukhya artha antara aprasiddhyā tad sadṛśe kokila ādau gauṇa tva ayogāt sva samāna arthaka kokila ādi śabda asādṛśyāt ca
gāvi ādi śabda vat tad mūlakasya

original: nahyadṛṣṭārtheṣu śākyādibhyo manvādīnāmiva padasvarūpajñāne itarebhyor'thanirṇaye 'nyasya balīyastvaṃ kiñcidviruddhamasti,
analyzed: nahi adṛṣṭa artheṣu śākya ādibhyaḥ manu ādīnām iva pada svarūpa jñāne itarebhyaḥ atha nirṇaye anyasya balīyaḥ tvam kiñcid viruddham asti
pratyuta ākāṅkṣita padārtha jñāne sādhakam eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: abhyupetyāpitu virodhaṃ śāstraprasiddheḥ daurbalyaṃ darśayati --- ataeveti //
analyzed: abhyupetya api tu virodham śāstra prasiddheḥ daurbalyam darśayati ataeva iti
sthāpita tvāt iti

svarūpa bala abala apekṣayā tad saṃbandhi anya gata bala abala mātra daurbalyasya pratipādita tvāt

original: tatsaṃbandhyanyacca yathā pramāṇaṃ tathā āśrayo 'pīti na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tad saṃbandhi anyat ca yathā pramāṇam tathā āśrayaḥ api iti na doṣaḥ
etat ca bhāṣyakāra matena uktam
vārtikakāra mate śiṣṭa ākopa adhikaraṇa bhaṅgena anyathā sūtrāṇām yojanāt

original: prameyabalābalajyāyastvasya tatra pūrvamanirūpaṇādihaiva āśrayagatabalābalāpekṣayā prameyabalābalasya vicāryatvāt //
analyzed: prameya balābala jyāyastvasya tatra pūrvam anirūpaṇāt iha eva āśraya gata bala abala apekṣayā prameya balābalasya vicārya tvāt
vārtika mate asya eva adhikaraṇasya viṣaya viśeṣe mleccha prasiddhi prābalya sādhaka tā iti nirūpaṇam

original: ato vārtikamate mlecchaprasiddheḥ prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavicārasyeva tadgatabalābalavicārasyāpi ihaiva kartavyatvādupajīvyatayedamadhikaraṇaṃ pīlvādivarṇakāt  #
analyzed: atas vārtika mate mleccha prasiddheḥ prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya vicārasya iva tad gata bala abala vicārasya api iha eva kartavya tvāt upajīvya tayā idam adhikaraṇam pīlu ādi varṇakāt  /
prāk arthataḥ draṣṭavyam

original: evañcāsmin mate prameyabalābalajyāyastvasthāpanasyātra pūrvapakṣākathanaṃ prati hetvākāṅkṣā saṃbhavati;
analyzed: evam ca asmin mate prameya balābala jyāyastva sthāpanasya atra pūrvapakṣa ākathanam prati hetu ākāṅkṣā saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi virodhe mlecchaprasiddheraprāmāṇye ukter'thādevāvirodhe prāmāṇyahetoḥ pūrvapakṣasādhakasyāsaṃbhavāt sūtrakṛtāpi svātantryeṇa tadakathanādeva  #

ca atra tad a kathanam iti jñeyam
iti pañcamam mleccha prasiddhi prāmāṇya adhikaraṇam
prayoga śāstram iti ced

original: sarvasmṛtīnāṃ kalpasūtrāṇāṃ vā ṣaḍaṅgānāmeva vā śākyādigranthānāṃ vā vedatvaṃ vedatulyatvaṃ vā bhavatu;
analyzed: sarva smṛtīnām kalpasūtrāṇām vā ṣaṣ aṅgānām eva vā śākya ādi granthānām vā veda tvam veda tulya tvam vā bhavatu
na śruti ādi mūlaka tve gauravāt
nitya brahmayajña vidhi viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ ca
ṣaṣ aṅgānām tu ṣaṣ aṅgam eke iti smṛteḥ api veda tvam
buddha bodhāyana maśaka ādibhiḥ tu samākhyā kaṭha ādi vat pravacana nimitta tvena api upapannā iti
prāpte dṛḍha kartṛ smaraṇāt kaṭha ādi vat pravacana nimitta tva anupapatteḥ na eṣām veda tvam veda tulya tvam vā
pratimanvantaram ca evaṃvidhānām granthānām sattvāt nitya brahmayajña vidhi viṣaya tva upapattiḥ
eka grahaṇāt tu ṣaḍaṅgam eke iti paramata upanyāsaḥ
tasmāt eṣām smṛti adhikaraṇa nyāyena veda mūlaka tvam eva
śākya ādi granthānām tu tad asambhavāt ābhāsa tvam eva

original: atra bhāṣyakṛtā sūtrānurodhena kalpasūtrāṇyudāhṛtya prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyacintā kṛtā /
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakṛtā sūtra anurodhena kalpasūtrāṇi udāhṛtya prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya cintā kṛtā

original: sā na yuktā; smṛtyadhikaraṇe vedātiriktavidyāsthānamātrasya vedamūlakatayā prāmāṇyasya sādhitatvena tadviruddhatvāt /
analyzed: sā na yuktā smṛti adhikaraṇe veda atirikta vidyā sthāna mātrasya veda mūlaka tayā prāmāṇyasya sādhita tvena tad viruddha tvāt
atas siddhānte sūtra dvayena svara niyama vākyaśeṣa abhidhānena veda vailakṣaṇya pratipādanāt
svatas prāmāṇya nirākaraṇa pratīteḥ pūrvapakṣe svātantryeṇa prāmāṇyam abhyupetya smṛti adhikaraṇa sādhita veda mūlaka tva hetuka prāmāṇya ākṣepeṇa
pūrvapakṣam upavarṇya tasya eva iha siddhānte nirākaraṇa dvārā smṛti adhikaraṇa sādhitasya
sthirīkaraṇena bhāṣya gata pramāṇa apramāṇa śabdayoḥ svātantrya asvātantrya vyākhyāyām ākṣepa hetoḥ sarvatra aviśeṣeṇa
smṛti ādiṣu api tad ākṣepa samādhānayoḥ saṃbhavāt kalpasūtra padam bhāṣya gatam upalakṣaṇam abhipretya
mleccha ācārāṇām keṣāñcid anādi tvena śiṣṭa ācāra tulya tayā svatantrya prāmāṇye abhihite

original: ihāpi vedatvena vedatulyatayā vā svataḥ prāmāṇyopapatternaiṣāṃ vedamūlatvaṃ tadvirodhena
analyzed: iha api veda tvena veda tulya tayā vā svatas prāmāṇya upapatteḥ na eṣām veda mūla tvam tad virodhena
vā na aprāmāṇyam yuktam iti anantara adhikaraṇa vyutpādita prāmāṇya upajīvanena smṛti virodha adhikaraṇa dvaya ākṣepāt ākṣepikīm
saṃgatim spaṣṭa tvāt a pradarśya eva udāharaṇāni darśayati sarva smṛtīnām iti

original: (kalpānāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca smṛtyadhikaraṇaviṣayatvena tadākṣepaparādhikaraṇaviṣayatvayogena kalpasūtrayoḥ lakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam)
analyzed: kalpānām sūtrāṇām ca smṛti adhikaraṇa viṣaya tvena tad ākṣepa para adhikaraṇa viṣaya tva yogena kalpa sūtrayoḥ lakṣaṇa ādi nirūpaṇam
na kevalam smṛti adhikaraṇe manu ādi smṛti mātram udāharaṇam
yena tāvat mātra viṣayaḥ eva ayam ākṣepaḥ bhavet

original: apitu vedātiriktānāṃ sarveṣāmevodāharaṇatvāt kalpasūtrādiviṣayasyāpi tasyākṣepaṃ sūcayitumāha --- kalpasūtrāṇāṃ veti //
analyzed: apitu veda atiriktānām sarveṣām eva udāharaṇa tvāt kalpasūtra ādi viṣayasya api tasya ākṣepam sūcayitum āha kalpasūtrāṇām vā iti
kalpāḥ ca sūtrāṇi ca iti vigrahaḥ

original: kalpā nāma prayogaṃ kalpayantīti vyutpattyā siddharūpaprayogapratipādakā granthā bodhāyanavārāhamāśakādipraṇītāḥ,
analyzed: kalpāḥ nāma prayogam kalpayanti iti vyutpattyā siddha rūpa prayoga pratipādakāḥ granthāḥ bodhāyana vārāha māśaka ādi praṇītāḥ

original: sūtrāṇi tu sūcayantīti vyutpattyā ṛcaṃ pādagrahaṇaṃ etattīrthamityācakṣate ityādisvaparibhāṣāsvasaṃjñābhiryutāni
analyzed: sūtrāṇi tu sūcayanti iti vyutpattyā ṛcam pāda grahaṇam etat tīrtham iti ācakṣate ityādi sva paribhāṣā sva saṃjñābhiḥ yutāni
prayoga viśeṣa unnāyaka lakṣaṇa pratipādakāḥ āśvalāyana baijāvāpa kātyāyana ādi kṛtāḥ granthāḥ iti bhedaḥ
tat uktam vārtike siddha rūpaḥ prayogaḥ yaiḥ karmaṇām anugamyate
tad kalpāḥ lakṣaṇa arthāni sūtrāṇi iti pracakṣate iti
anyatra api laghūni sūcita arthāni su alpa akṣara padāni ca
sarvatas sāra bhūtāni sūtrāṇi āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ iti
śākya ādi granthānām kalpasūtra adhikaraṇa viṣaya tva upapādanam śākya ādi iti

original: yadyapi smṛtyadhikaraṇe śākyādigranthānāṃ na prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitaṃ,
analyzed: yadi api smṛti adhikaraṇe śākya ādi granthānām na prāmāṇyam sādhitam
yena ākṣepa viṣaya tā ucyeta

original: tathāpi virodhādhikaraṇe vārtikakṛtā teṣāṃ vedamūlatvāsaṃbhavenāprāmāṇyasya pratipāditatvādihākṣepasādhitahetoḥ
analyzed: tathā api virodha adhikaraṇe vārtikakṛtā teṣām veda mūla tva asaṃbhavena aprāmāṇyasya pratipādita tvāt iha ākṣepa sādhita hetoḥ

original: svātantryasyāprāmāṇyākṣepe 'pi pravṛtteḥ siddhāntānupayoge 'pi vicāraviṣayatvamupapadyate iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: svātantryasya aprāmāṇya ākṣepe api pravṛtteḥ siddhānta anupayoge api vicāra viṣaya tvam upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ
atra sarvatra vā śabdaḥ na pakṣa antara dyotakaḥ
kintu anāsthā dyotakaḥ san sarveṣu udāharaṇa tva jñāpakaḥ eva
veda tvena veda tulya tvena vā lāghavāt kalpasūtrāṇām prāmāṇya pūrvapakṣaḥ
atas eva vārtike evam etāni catvāri api vidyā sthānāni iti uktam
gauravāt iti

original: yathaiva smṛtyadhikaraṇe bhrāntyādimūlatvakalpanāto vedamūlatvakalpanāyā laghubhūtatvāt vedamūlatvamevāśritam,
analyzed: yathā eva smṛti adhikaraṇe bhrānti ādi mūla tva kalpanātaḥ veda mūla tva kalpanāyāḥ laghu bhūta tvāt veda mūla tvam eva āśritam
tathā eva dṛḍhatara śiṣṭa traivarṇika parigraheṇa avaśya vaktavye prāmāṇye veda mūla tva kalpanā apekṣayā api
apauruṣeya tva kalpanāyāḥ laghu bhūta tvāt tat eva yuktam āśrayitum iti apauruṣeya tva sāmyāt
manu ādi nibandhanāni
vedāḥ
dharma mūla tvāt
vidhivat iti anumānena veda tvam
yadātu tāni avedāḥ
veda mudrā rahita tvāt veda tvena abhiyukta prasiddhi abhāvāt vā kāvya vat iti sat pratipakṣa anumāna parāhata tvam upanyasyeta
tadā veda tulya tvam vā iti arthaḥ
kiñca manu ādi smṛtīnām tirohita prāya veda artha nibandhana tvāt kathañcid arthavat tve api
kalpasūtrāṇām vispaṣṭam sakala jana pratyakṣa veda artha upanibandhanāt praṇayana ānarthakya āpatteḥ
śākhā antara vat eva apauruṣeya tvena veda tvam yuktam
nahi sakala jana pratyakṣa veda vākya artha viṣayam artham vadatām eṣām puruṣaiḥ praṇayanam saṃbhavati
tathātve vā amīṣām vidhāyaka upasthāna mātreṇa caritārtha tvāt dharma pramā janaka tva anupapatteḥ dharma mūla smaraṇa anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
anādi brahmayajña vidhi viṣaya tvena smṛtīnām svatas pramāṇa dharma adharma pramiti janaka tvena śākya ādi gnthānām ca prāmāṇya nirūpaṇam
nitya brahmayajña iti

original: “aharahaḥ svādhyāyamadhīyīte“tyupakramya “yadṛco 'dhīte yadyajūṃṣi yadbrāhmaṇānītihāsānpurāṇāni kalpāni“ti nityo 'nādisiddho brahmayajñavidhiḥ
analyzed: ahar ahar svādhyāyam adhīyīta iti upakramya yat ṛcaḥ adhīte yat yajūṃṣi yat brāhmaṇāni itihāsān purāṇāni kalpān iti nityaḥ anādi siddhaḥ brahmayajña vidhiḥ
nahi kalpa ādīnām ādhunika tve saḥ upapadyate iti arthaḥ
yadi api na śākya ādi granthānām nitya brahmayajña vidhi viṣaya tvam

original: tathāpi śākyādigranthebhyo dharmādharmāvagateḥ svasaṃvedyatvāttasyāśca svataḥprāmāṇyasya tarkapāde sthāpitatvādāptoktatvalakṣaṇaguṇābhāve 'pi  #
analyzed: tathā api śākya ādi granthebhyaḥ dharma adharma avagateḥ sva saṃvedya tvāt tasyāḥ ca svatas prāmāṇyasya tarka pāde sthāpita tvāt āpta ukta tva lakṣaṇa guṇa abhāve api
prāmāṇya avighātaḥ

original: naca --- mīmāṃsakaiḥ prāmāṇyānabhyupagame 'pi śākyaiḥ parataḥprāmāṇyābhyupagamāt āptoktatvalakṣaṇaguṇābhāve kathaṃ prāmāṇyopapattiḥ?
analyzed: naca mīmāṃsakaiḥ prāmāṇya anabhyupagame api śākyaiḥ paratas prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt āpta ukta tva lakṣaṇa guṇa abhāve katham prāmāṇya upapattiḥ

original: “utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmanityate“ti śākyena pravāhanityatvena kūṭasthanityatvena vā dharmanityatvasyoktatvāt,
analyzed: utpādāt vā tathāgatānām anutpādāt vā sthitā eva eṣām dharma nityatā iti śākyena pravāha nitya tvena kūṭastha nitya tvena vā dharma nitya tvasya ukta tvāt

original: tatra nityatvasya ca tatpratipādakāgamanityatvamantareṇānupapatteḥ nityānāṃ cāgamānāṃ asvatastve prāmāṇyānirvāhāt svatastvābhyupagame 'pi apasiddhāntānāpatteḥ
analyzed: tatra nitya tvasya ca tad pratipādaka āgama nitya tvam antareṇa anupapatteḥ nityānām ca āgamānām asvatastve prāmāṇya anirvāhāt svatastva abhyupagame api apasiddhānta anāpatteḥ
evam sati api yadi sva kartṛkatvam abhyupagamyeta
tadā kartṛ doṣeṇa prāmāṇya avagatiḥ bādhyeta api
na tu tad abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ gauravāt

original: evañca yadyapi vedamūlakatve nirākṛte vedatvaṃ vedatulyatvaṃ vā dūreṇāpāstam;
analyzed: evam ca yadi api veda mūlaka tve nirākṛte veda tvam veda tulya tvam vā dūreṇa apāstam
tathā api śākya ādiḥ coraḥ sva āgama prāmāṇya grāmam pratyakṣa ādi mūla tvena anya dvāreṇa praveṣṭum udyataḥ
vāritaḥ varam na praviśet

original: saṃprati tu mīmāṃsakānumatenāpauruṣeyatvena mahāpathenaiva prakaṭaṃ praveṣṭuṃ icchatī“ti vārtikoktarītyā saṃbhavatyevāprāmāṇyākṣepeṇa svātantryeṇa  #
analyzed: saṃprati tu mīmāṃsaka anumatena apauruṣeya tvena mahā pathena eva prakaṭam praveṣṭum icchati iti vārtika ukta rītyā saṃbhavati eva aprāmāṇya ākṣepeṇa svātantryeṇa
prāmāṇyam iti bhāvaḥ
aṅgānām tu veda tve spaṣṭam eva hetum āha aṅgānām tu iti
mantra brāhmaṇayoḥ veda nāmadheyam ṣaṣ aṅgam ekaḥ eti gautama smṛteḥ spaṣṭam eva veda tvam iti arthaḥ
apauruṣeya tve bodhāyana bauddha māśaka ādi samākhyā anupapattim kāṭhaka ādi samākhyā vat upapattyā pariharati buddha iti
etādṛśa samākhyā mūlikā eva eṣu lokānām pauruṣeya tva bhrāntiḥ iti arthaḥ
dṛśya abhāva sādhakasya dṛśya adarśanasya iva iha kartṛ abhāva sādhakasya asmartavya asmaraṇasya abhāvena
veda vat akartṛkatva anupapatteḥ pauruṣeya tve api prāmāṇyasya lāghava mātreṇa tad sādhane
kālidāsa ādi vākyeṣu api tad āpatteḥ tasya prāmāṇya upaṣṭambhaka tvena svatas pramāṇa tva abhāvāt ca

original: nāpauruṣeyatvasiddhyā vedatvaṃ vedatulyatvaṃ vetyabhipretya siddhāntamāha --- dṛḍheti //
analyzed: na apauruṣeya tva siddhyā veda tvam veda tulya tvam vā iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha dṛḍha iti
atas ca smartavya asmaraṇa hetunā veda apauruṣeya tve nyāyataḥ svara vākyaśeṣa ādi mudrā ādibhiḥ ca
siddhe kāṭhaka ādi samākhyāyāḥ tad anurodhena pravacana nimitta tva aṅgīkāre api iha kartṛ abhāva sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena

original: pratyuta tatsādhakapramāṇasattvena pravacananimittatvena na tattatsamākhyā netuṃ yuktā /
analyzed: pratyuta tad sādhaka pramāṇa sattvena pravacana nimitta tvena na tat tat samākhyā netum yuktā

original: evaṃ satyapi yadi traivarṇikānāṃ dharmatvasmaraṇaṃ apauruṣeyatvaṃ vinā nopapadyeta,
analyzed: evam sati api yadi traivarṇikānām dharma tva smaraṇam apauruṣeya tvam vinā na upapadyeta
tatas kalpyeta api tat
tat tu veda mūla tvena api upapannataram iti abhipretya upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: (B1) prayojanaṃ kalpādīnāṃ vedatve tattulyatve vā yatra pratyakṣaśrutivirodhastatra vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: prayojanam kalpa ādīnām veda tve tad tulya tve vā yatra pratyakṣa śruti virodhaḥ tatra vikalpaḥ
yatra vā pratyakṣa śruti virodha abhāve api nyāya ubhāsa upanyāsa pūrvakam vacanam
tatra api vacana tvāt eva tad anuṣṭhānam
nyāya upanyāsaḥ tu hetu adhikaraṇa nyāyena artha vādaḥ
siddhānte tu pratyakṣa śruti virodhe sat nyāya virodhe ca yāvat mūla śruti darśanam ananuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam
śruti darśana uttaran tu vikalpaḥ

original: yatra tu nyāyopanyāsarahitaṃ mīmāṃsānyāyaviruddhañca smṛtervacanaṃ tatra śrutimūlakatvasambhavena vacanavirodhe nyāyasyaivābhāsatvāttadartha  #
analyzed: yatra tu nyāya upanyāsa rahitam mīmāṃsā nyāya viruddham ca smṛteḥ vacanam tatra śruti mūlaka tva sambhavena vacana virodhe nyāyasya eva ābhāsa tvāt tad artha
eva anuṣṭheyaḥ iti

original: atra sarvatrodāharaṇāni mūloktodāharaṇadūṣaṇāni cāsmatkṛte kaustubhe draṣṭavyāni // 9 //
analyzed: atra sarvatra udāharaṇāni mūla ukta udāharaṇa dūṣaṇāni ca asmad kṛte kaustubhe draṣṭavyāni  /
yā tu nitya brahmayajña vidhi viṣaya tva anupapattiḥ
tām pariharati nityā iti
yathā eva vrīhi tva jātim ādāya nitya saṃyoga virodha parihāraḥ
tathā sarva grantheṣu vākya tva vat kalpya tva jāti anaṅgīkāre api kḷpi dhātvartha anusāreṇa
veda artha prakalpaka tva upādhinā evañjātīyakānām granthānām sarvakālam keṣāṃcid saṃbhavena
pravāha nitya tayā nitya saṃyoga avirodha upapatteḥ na doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
yat tu aṅgānām veda tva smaraṇam
tad eka grahaṇāt eva pūrvapakṣa tva pratīteḥ mantra brāhmaṇayoḥ veda nāmadheyam iti atra eka grahaṇa abhāvena siddhānta tva pratīteḥ asat mūlakam iti āha  /
eka grahaṇāt tu iti
yat tu praṇayana vaiyarthya āpādanam
tat nānā śākhā gatānām ekādaśa kapāla tva ādīnām samuccitānām ca prayoja ādi anumantraṇa mantra ādīnām
śākhā antarīya vākya adhīna bādha upasaṃhāra parisaṃkhyā padārtha lakṣaṇa apūrva tā ādi jñāna artha tvāt yuktam
upasaṃhārasya mīmāṃsā abhijñaiḥ sva śākhā mātra adhyāyibhiḥ kvacid udāharaṇa viśeṣe jñātum
śakya tve api sarva udāharaṇeṣu jñātum aśakya tvāt tad tad artha smṛti vikṣepaka artha vāda tyāgena
saṃprati anuṣṭhānasya kartum aśakya tvāt ca praṇayana sārthakya upapatteḥ pariharaṇīyam
prakṛte śākhā antara vat adhyetṛ bheda abhāvāt tulya adhyetṛka tvāt tvad mate eva vidhi antara ānarthakyam iti abhyāsāt karma antara tva āpatteḥ atīva gauravam
mama tu pratyakṣa vidhi vihita artha anuvādaka tve api anuṣṭhāna saukarya artham kalpa ādinā upasthāpanam arthavat iti
na ca evam ekaikasyām śākhāyām pañca ṣaṣ saṃkhyāka kalpasūtra āmnāna vaiyarthyam
ekena eva tad upasthāpana siddheḥ iti vācyam

original: svādhyāyādhyayanavidhau svapadopādānāt pāraṃparyāgataikaśākhādhyayananiyamasyeva “bahvalpaṃ vāsvagṛhyoktaṃ yasya yāvatprakīrtitaṃ /
analyzed: svādhyāya adhyayana vidhau sva pada upādānāt pāraṃparya āgata eka śākhā adhyayana niyamasya iva bahu alpam vā sva gṛhya uktam yasya yāvat prakīrtitam

original: tasya tāvati śāstrārthe kṛte sarvaḥ kṛto bhavedi“ti śākhāntarādhikaraṇagatasarvāṅgopasaṃhārānukalpavidhāvapi
analyzed: tasya tāvati śāstra arthe kṛte sarvaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavet iti śākhā antara adhikaraṇa gata sarva aṅga upasaṃhāra anukalpa vidhau api
sva pada upādānena gṛhya pada upalakṣita kalpasūtra ādīnām api pāraṃparya āgata eka gṛhya sūtra adhyayana niyamasya api
pratīteḥ aneka kalpasūtra ādi adhyayanasya aprasaktyā anekaiḥ upasthāpanena sārthakya upapatteḥ
na hi uttara adhikaraṇe kalpasūtra ādīnām parigraha vyavasthā api nirasiṣyate apitu tad artha vyavasthā eva

original: ataśca yānyāśvalāyanakātyāyanasūtrādīni tāni tattaccaraṇaireva paṭhanīyānītyevaṃparigrahavyavasthayā netaravaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca yāni āśvalāyana kātyāyana sūtra ādīni tāni tad tad caraṇaiḥ eva paṭhanīyāni iti evam parigraha vyavasthayā na itara vaiyarthyam iti bhāvaḥ
yat api dharma pramā janaka tva asaṃbhavaḥ iti uktam
tatra yatra eṣām mūla bhūtā śrutiḥ na pratyakṣā
tatra laukika vākya vat dharma pramā janaka tva abhāve api mūla bhūta śruti upasthāpaka tvena
dharma pramā prayojaka tva upapatteḥ bhāktam eva prāmāṇyam iti smṛti adhikaraṇe eva pratipādanāt nirasanīyam
yatra mūla bhūtā śrutiḥ pratyakṣā

original: tatrāpi tattātparyāvadhāraṇasya kalpasūtrādyadhīnatvāt tātparyaviṣayībhūtārthaviṣayapramājanakatvāt tadupapattiriti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: tatra api tad tātparya avadhāraṇasya kalpasūtra ādi adhīna tvāt tātparya viṣayībhūta artha viṣaya pramā janaka tvāt tad upapattiḥ iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
śākya ādi grantha a prāmāṇya vyavasthāpanam

original: evaṃ vedamūlakatvena kalpādīnāṃ prāmāṇye sādhite 'pi śākyādigranthānāmapi samānanyāyātprāmāmye bhrāntiṃ prasaktāṃ pūrvahetunaiva nirasyati  #
analyzed: evam veda mūlaka tvena kalpa ādīnām prāmāṇye sādhite api śākya ādi granthānām api samāna nyāyāt prāmāmye bhrāntim prasaktām pūrva hetunā eva nirasyati
śākya ādi granthānām tu iti
tad asaṃbhavāt iti
veda aprāmāṇya vādibhiḥ eva tad prāmāṇya aṅgīkāreṇa veda mūlaka tvasya asaṃbhavāt iti arthaḥ
kalpasūtra adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa prayojanāni

original: nanu kalpādīnāṃ siddhānte vedamūlakatvena prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre kiṃ vicāraprayojanamityapekṣāyāmāha --- prayojanamiti //
analyzed: nanu kalpa ādīnām siddhānte veda mūlaka tvena prāmāṇya aṅgīkāre kim vicāra prayojanam iti apekṣāyām āha prayojanam iti
yatra pratyakṣā iti

original: yathā “audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyet” iti śrutyāveṣṭanaviṣayakasūtrasya virodho bhāṣyakāramate,
analyzed: yathā audumbarīm spṛṣṭvā udgāyet iti śruti āveṣṭana viṣayaka sūtrasya virodhaḥ bhāṣyakāra mate
yathā vā puroḍāśam paryagnikaroti iti kalpasūtra vacanānām virodhaḥ tatra iti arthaḥ
yatravā iti yathā anyatra tad artha vāda vacanāt iti pañcama adhyāya gata āśvalāyana vacane

original: “suṣiro vā etarhi paśuryarhivapāmutkhidati yadvrīhimayaḥ puroḍāśo bhavatyapidhānāya”
analyzed: suṣiraḥ vai etarhi paśuḥ yarhi vapām utkhidati yat vrīhi mayaḥ puroḍāśaḥ bhavati apidhānāya
iti artha vāda avagata chidra apidhāna artha tvasya agnīṣomīya paśupuroḍāśe avagateḥ tasya ca
savanīye atideśa prāptasya api a karaṇam anusavanam savanīyāḥ puroḍāśāḥ nirupyante vrīhi tvāt chidra tāyāḥ
iti arthavāda avagata chidra apidhāna rūpa phalaka savanīyaiḥ eva tad kāryasya siddheḥ nyāya ābhāsa upanyāsa pūrvakam
pratipāditam tat vacanam iti arthaḥ
kalpasūtra adhikaraṇa siddhānta prayojanāni
sat nyāya virodhe ca iti
dvādaśa adhyāye chidra apidhāna artha tvāt puroḍāśaḥ na syāt anyeṣām evam artha tvāt iti adhikaraṇe

original: pūrvoktarītyā paśupuroḍāśasyākaraṇaṃ “puroḍāśena mādhyandine savane” iti liṅgāt vikalpena
analyzed: pūrva ukta rītyā paśupuroḍāśasya akaraṇam puroḍāśena mādhyandine savane iti liṅgāt vikalpena
vā karaṇam iti pūrvapakṣam prāpayya chidra apidhāna pratipādanasya arthavāda mātra tvāt daśame
devatā saṃskāra arthatvasya sādhita tvāt nitya tvena kartavyaḥ eva iti siddhāntitam
atra mīmāṃsā sannyāyaḥ
tad virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
mīmāṃsā nyāya viruddham ca iti

original: yathā navame agniṣṭuti subrahmaṇyānigadagatānāṃ harivadvādipadānāṃ nyāyenānūhaḥ sādhitaḥ,
analyzed: yathā navame agniṣṭuti subrahmaṇyā nigada gatānām harivat vādi padānām nyāyena anūhaḥ sādhitaḥ

original: tadviruddhaṃ “agna āgaccha rohitāśva bṛhadbhāno dhūmaketo jātavedo vicarṣaṇa” ityūhitapāṭhabodhakaṃ chandogasūtrakāravacanam /
analyzed: tad viruddham agne āgaccha rohitāśva bṛhadbhāno dhūmaketo jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe iti ūhita pāṭha bodhakam chandoga sūtra kāra vacanam

original: yathāvā “tathā yūpasya vedi” rititārtīyādhikaraṇe “ardhamantarvedi minotī“ti vacanena
analyzed: yathā avā tathā yūpasya vediḥ iti tārtīya adhikaraṇe ardham antarvedi minoti iti vacanena
yūpa ardha uddeśena antarvedi deśa aṅga tvena vihiteḥ athāt yūpa ardhasya bahirvedi deśe prāpte
bahirvedi iti ayam anuvādaḥ iti pūrvapakṣam prāpayya a saṃskṛta deśe eva antarvedi barhirvedi padābhyām
lakṣayitvā vidhīyate iti siddhāntitam
tatra pūrvapakṣe yūpa aṅga tvāt yūpa vṛddhau paśu ekādaśinyām aṅga vṛddheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt pratiyūpam
vedi vṛddhiḥ iti etat mūlam prastuta utkarṣam prakṛtyā āpastaṃbaiḥ āmnātam yāvat yūpam vedim uddhanti iti
kalpasūtra kāra vacanam siddhānta nyāya viruddham

original: yathāvā dvādaśādhikaraṇe daikṣai śrute “jāghanyā patnīssaṃyājayantī“ti vākye paśvanuniṣpannajāghanyāḥ pratipattyapekṣatvāt tatpratipattyarthatayā  #
analyzed: yathā vā dvādaśa adhikaraṇe daikṣaiḥ śrute jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti iti vākye paśu anuniṣpanna jāghanyāḥ pratipatti apekṣa tvāt tad pratipatti artha tayā
patnīsaṃyājānām vidhānam
tatas ca atideśa prāpta tayā paśu aikādaśinyām sarvāsām api jāghanīnām saṃskārya tva anurodhena

original: sarvābhiḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ kāryā iti jāghanīsamuccayapūrvapakṣaṃ prāpayya ājyena saha
analyzed: sarvābhiḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ kāryāḥ iti jāghanī samuccaya pūrvapakṣam prāpayya ājyena saha

original: vikalpena prāptāyā jāghanyā niyamārthatvena vidhānopapattau na patnīsaṃyājādīnāṃ
analyzed: vikalpena prāptāyāḥ jāghanyāḥ niyama artha tvena vidhāna upapattau na patnīsaṃyāja ādīnām
aprākṛta kārya artha tvam kalpanīyam

original: tataśca arthakarmatve sati jāghanyā upādeyatvena vivakṣitaikatvādyayā kayācidekayā tayā patnīsaṃyājā iti siddhāntitam /
analyzed: tatas ca artha karma tve sati jāghanyāḥ upādeya tvena vivakṣita ekatvāt yayā kayācid ekayā tayā patnīsaṃyājāḥ iti siddhāntitam

original: ataśca mīmāṃsānyāyaviruddham “jāghanībhiḥ patnīḥ saṃyājayantī“ti bahuvacanāntajāghanīpadaghaṭitaṃ kalpasūtrakāravacanamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca mīmāṃsā nyāya viruddham jāghanībhiḥ patnīḥ saṃyājayanti iti bahuvacana anta jāghanī pada ghaṭitam kalpasūtra kāra vacanam iti arthaḥ

original: yattu --- śāstradīpikāyāṃ etādṛśavacanānāṃ nyāyopanyāsarahitānāmapi mīmāṃsānyāyavirodhe sarvathāprāmāṇyamuktam,
analyzed: yat tu śāstradīpikāyām etādṛśa vacanānām nyāya upanyāsa rahitānām api mīmāṃsā nyāya virodhe sarvathā aprāmāṇyam uktam
tad nyāya virodha abhāve śruti mūlaka tva abhāva aniścayāt teṣu bahu tva ādi smaraṇasya śruti mūla tva upapatteḥ upekṣaṇīyam iti vyaktam kaustubhe
atra iti granthaḥ vyākhyāta caraḥ
iti ṣaṣṭham kalpasūtra adhikaraṇam

original: evaṃ tāvatsamṛtīnāmācārāṇāṃ ātmatuṣṭeśca vedamūlakatvena prāmāṇye dṛḍhīkṛte avasaraprāptatvāt
analyzed: evam tāvat sa mṛtīnām ācārāṇām ātma tuṣṭeḥ ca veda mūlaka tvena prāmāṇye dṛḍhīkṛte avasara prāpta tvāt
keṣucid smṛti ācāreṣu mūla bhūta veda gataḥ viśeṣaḥ tad tad adhyetṛ ācaritṛ adhikāra anadhikāra vicāra phalībhūtaḥ cintyate

original: evamavasarasaṅgatimathaśabdena sūcayan viṣayaṃ darśayati --- atha yatreti //
analyzed: evam avasara saṅgatim atha śabdena sūcayan viṣayam darśayati atha yatra iti

original: yathā gautamīyā smṛtiśchandogaireva paṭhyate tathā gobhilīyamapi;

holāka ādi iti

ādi pada dvayena yathā holāka ācāraḥ prācyaiḥ eva
evam vasanta utsavaḥ
tathā sva sva kula āgata karañja arka ādi sthāvara pūjā ādi ācāraḥ āhnīnaibuka saṃjñaḥ dākṣiṇātyaiḥ eva

original: tathā “jyeṣṭhāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ balīvardānabhyarcya dhāvayantī” tyudvṛṣabhayajña udīcyaireva /
analyzed: tathā jyeṣṭhāyām paurṇamāsyām balīvardān abhyarcya dhāvayantī udīcyaiḥ eva
tathā ayam eva utsavaḥ bhādrapada amāvāsyāyām dākṣiṇātyaiḥ eva

original: tathā mātṛgaṇapūjācāraḥ pratīcyaireva iti vyavasthayā teṣāmapi vicāraviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: tathā mātṛ gaṇa pūjā ācāraḥ pratīcyaiḥ eva iti vyavasthayā teṣām api vicāra viṣaya tvāt
evam kvacid deśa viśeṣe kaiścid evam kiñcid kriyate teṣām api upalakṣaṇam
yat tu nyāyasudhā kṛtā gṛhya a pratipādya viṣaya viśeṣāṇām eva atra vicāra viṣaya tvena udāharaṇa tvam
na tu pārvaṇa sthālīpāka upanaya ādīnām gṛhya vihitānām api iti uktam

original: yattu --- yathāśrutabhāṣyānusārāt holākādyācārāḥ smṛtayaśca prācyādibhinnān prati pramāṇaṃ naveti vicārasvarūpaṃ kaiścit --- uktam;
analyzed: yat tu yathāśruta bhāṣya anusārāt holāka ādi ācārāḥ smṛtayaḥ ca prācya ādi bhinnān prati pramāṇam na vā iti vicāra svarūpam kaiścid uktam
tad prāmāṇyasya āloka vat sarva puruṣa asādhāraṇyāt vyavasthā śaṅkā anupapatteḥ ayuktam iti upekṣyam
pramāṇa bhūta mūla śruti gata viśeṣa pūrvapakṣam eva phalībhūta vicāra sahitam darśayati tatra iti
anumāna

original: atha yatra smṛtiṣu pāṭhavyavasthā yathā gautamīyā chandogaireva,
analyzed: atha yatra smṛtiṣu pāṭha vyavasthā yathā gautamīyā chandogaiḥ eva
tathā ācāreṣu kartṛ vyavasthā yathā holāka ādi prācya ādi abhimānibhiḥ eva

original: tatra tadanumeyaśrutirapi anumāpakasya niyataviṣayatvānniyatādhikārikaiveti nānyaistadanuṣṭheyamiti prāpte ----- yadyapi anumāpakaṃ niyataviṣayam;
analyzed: tatra tad anumeya śrutiḥ api anumāpakasya niyata viṣaya tvāt niyata ādhikārikā eva iti na anyaiḥ tat anuṣṭheyam iti prāpte yadi api anumāpakam niyata viṣayam

original: tathāpi nānumeyaśrutau viśeṣaṇaṃ prācyatvādi dātuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: tathā api na anumeya śrutau viśeṣaṇam prācya tva ādi dātum śakyam

original: nahi prācyatvaṃ nāma sarvācaritranugataṃ jātivyaktiguṇasaṃsthānādibhirnirvaktuṃ śakyam;
analyzed: nahi prācya tvam nāma sarva ācaritṛ anugatam jāti vyakti guṇa saṃsthāna ādibhiḥ nirvaktum śakyam
tad tad deśa gatānām api an ācaraṇāt
cira vinirgata putra pautrāṇām api ācaraṇāt ca
atas viśeṣaṇa abhāvāt sarva viṣaya tvam
gautamīya ādi smṛtiṣu tu na chandoga ādhikārika tva smaraṇam
yena śrutau api tat sambhāvyate
pāṭha mātram tu teṣām smṛti kartuḥ tad śākhīya tvāt api upapannam

original: kartā hi chandogaḥ svaśiṣyān chandogān svagranthamadhyāpayāmāsa te 'pyanyān ityevaṃ pāṭhastanmātrevyavasthita iti tatrāpi sarvaviṣayatvameva
analyzed: kartā hi chandogaḥ sva śiṣyān chandogān sva grantham adhyāpayāmāsa te api anyān iti evam pāṭhaḥ tad mātra iva avasthitaḥ iti tatra api sarva viṣaya tvam eva

original: yathaiva dhūmasya parvatavṛttitvadarśanāt vahnerapi parvatavṛttitvenaivānumānaṃ tathaiva
analyzed: yathā eva dhūmasya parvata vṛtti tva darśanāt vahneḥ api parvata vṛtti tvena eva anumānam tathā eva
śruti anumāpaka tvasya smṛti ācāra rūpasya liṅgasya keṣucid eva vyavasthita tvāt anumīyamānāyāḥ
śruteḥ api vyavasthita viṣaya tvam eva kalpayitum yuktam
yadi tu arthāpatti vidhayā tad kalpanam

original: tadā yadyapi tadviṣayaśrutikalpanamātreṇa tasyāḥ parihārānna niyatakartṛkalpanā prāmāṇikītyucyeta,
analyzed: tadā yadi api tad viṣaya śruti kalpana mātreṇa tasyāḥ parihārāt na niyata kartṛ kalpanā prāmāṇikī iti ucyeta
tathā api sāmānya śruti kalpane tad pravartitayoḥ smṛti ācārayoḥ api sarva viṣaya tva āpatteḥ anupapatti aparihārāt vyavasthita śruti kalpanam eva yuktam iti arthaḥ
sarvatra kartṛ viśeṣa jñānam sāmarthyāt niṣedha vaśāt upapadāt vā
yathā dvijānām eva āhitāgni tvāt śūdra ādeḥ tad abhāvāt agnihotra ādiṣu kartṛ viśeṣa jñānam sāmarthyāt
yathā vā patita ṣaṇḍha ādīnām niṣedhāt aniṣiddheṣu eva patita ṣaṇḍha rūpa kartṛ viśeṣa jñānam niṣedha vaśāt
yathā vā rājasūye rāja rūpa kartṛ viśeṣa jñānam rāja rūpa upapadāt bhavati
prakṛte katham api kartṛ viśeṣa jñāna abhāva samarthanam

original: prakṛteca na niṣedho na vā sāmarthyaṃ niyāmakamasti;
analyzed: prakṛte ca na niṣedhaḥ na vā sāmarthyam niyāmakam asti
a pratyakṣa tvāt

yat tu upapadam aśrutam kalpanīyam

original: tattu naiva śrutau dātuṃ śakyate ityabhipretya siddhāntamāha --- yadyapīti /
analyzed: tat tu na eva śrutau dātum śakyate iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha yadi api iti

tathā api kalpaka smṛtau pada apāṭhāt na aśrutakalpakam kiñcid asti pramāṇam

original: yastu pāṭhaḥ sa tu pāṭhaṃ vināpyavagatamātrasya smṛtivākyasya śrutikalpakatvopapatterakiñcitkaraḥ //

iti saptamam holāka adhikaraṇam
atra ācāra prāmāṇya prasaṃgāt sādhu bhūta go śabda prayoga ācārasya sāsnādimataḥ padārthasya
kārya bhūta vākya artha pramā karaṇa tvāt prāmāṇyasya iva asādhu gāvī ādi śabda prayoga ācārasya
tādṛśa pramā karaṇa tvam asti na vā iti cintā

original: sāca yadyapi pīlvādivarṇake yavavarāhādhikaraṇe bhāṣyamatenābhiyuktācārāt śāstrasthācārasya
analyzed: sā ca yadi api pīlu ādi varṇake yava varāha adhikaraṇe bhāṣya matena abhiyukta ācārāt śāstra stha ācārasya
balavatvam sādhitam iti iha api smṛti adhikaraṇa sādhita smṛti prāmāṇyena sādhita prāmāṇyaka vyākaraṇa anugṛhīta ācāra balīyaḥ tvāt

original: nodetītyetadarthaṃ prathamato mūlabhūtavyākaraṇaprāmāṇyaṃ sādhitamapi na saṃbhavatītyetadavaśyaṃ
analyzed: na udeti iti etad artham prathamatas mūla bhūta vyākaraṇa prāmāṇyam sādhitam api na saṃbhavati iti etat avaśyam
sādhanīyam eva darśayati smṛti adhikaraṇa iti
smṛti adhikaraṇa ākṣepena etad adhikaraṇa pravṛtti nirūpaṇam

original: samūlatve tatprāmāṇyāttadanugatā eva gavādayaḥ śabdā jyotiṣṭomādikarmaṇi prayoktavyāḥ,
analyzed: sa mūla tve tad prāmāṇyāt tad anugatāḥ eva go ādayaḥ śabdāḥ jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmaṇi prayoktavyāḥ
na tu tad ananugatāḥ gāvī ādayaḥ api

original: nirmūlatvetu tatprāmāmyābhāvānniyāmakābhāvena pratyāyakatvāviśeṣāt sarveṣāṃ prayogassiddho bhavatītyataḥ tadākṣipya samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: nirmūla tve tu tad prāmāmya abhāvāt niyāmaka abhāvena pratyāyaka tva aviśeṣāt sarveṣām prayogaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iti atas tat ākṣipya samādhīyate iti arthaḥ
iti eke iti prayoga niyamaḥ iti arthaḥ
iti aparaḥ iti
sādhu śabda prayoga niyama asaṃbhava nirūpaṇam

original: tatra na tāvat ādyo niyamaḥsaṃbhavatiḥ niyamābhāvepyasādhubhyaḥ prayogasvarūpasya tatkāryābhidhānasya jāyamānatvena tatsvarūpe kārye vopayogābhāvāt
analyzed: tatra na tāvat ādyaḥ niyamaḥ saṃbhavatiḥ niyama abhāve pi asādhubhyaḥ prayoga sva rūpasya tad kārya abhidhānasya jāyamāna tvena tad sva rūpe kārye vā upayoga abhāvāt
avihita tvena ca prayogasya adṛṣṭārtha tva abhāvena avaghāta ādi niyamasya iva apūrve pi upayoga kalpanā anupapatteḥ ca
atha rāga prāpta bhojana āśrita prāṅbhukha tva niyama vat artha prāpta prayoga āśrita sādhu niyamaḥ dharmāya vidhīyate iti ucyate
tatra āha na ca iti
na tāvat atra pratyakṣa ādikam mūlam saṃbhavati
teṣām dharma adharmayoḥ apravṛtteḥ

original: vedavākyasya mūlatayā kalpanāyāmapi pratiśabdaṃ 'gośabdenābhidadhyāt na gāvīśabdene'tyevaṃ kalpanasya anantaśrutipāṭhāsaṃbhavādasaṃbhavaḥ /

na ca paṭhitānām eva mūla tvam
nitya anumeya śruti mūla tvasya nirākṛta tvāt

original: ekaikasya ca sādhuśabdasya gāvīgoṇyādyanekāpaśabdadarśanena tadviṣayapratiṣedhānāṃ pratipadakalpane 'tyantamānantyaprasaṃgāt pāṭhānupapatteśca
analyzed: ekaikasya ca sādhu śabdasya gāvī goṇī ādi aneka apa śabda darśanena tad viṣaya pratiṣedhānām pratipad akalpane atyantam ānantya prasaṃgāt pāṭha anupapatteḥ ca

original: 'sādhubhirbhāṣeta nāsādhubhiri'tyevaṃ sādhutvāsādhutvopapadakalpanena tatkalpanāyāṃ tayornirvaktumaśakteḥ na saṃbhava ityabhipretyāha --- pratīti
analyzed: asādhubhiḥ bhāṣeta na asādhubhiḥ iti evam sādhu tva asādhu tva upapada kalpanena tad kalpanāyām tayoḥ nirvaktum aśakteḥ na saṃbhavaḥ iti abhipretya āha prati iti
pūrvavat iti anena pūrva adhikaraṇa upapādita upapada asaṃbhava rūpa hetu upajīvanena pūrvapakṣa utthānāt anantara saṃgatiḥ sūcitā
nirvacana asaṃbhavam upapādayati anādi iti
avadhya smaraṇe sati vācaka tvam iti arthaḥ
na ca na ca sādhu śabda smaraṇāt śakti bhramāt vā prayoga pratyayayoḥ upapattiḥ
gavā ādiṣu api tathātvasya vaktum śakya tvena vinigamana avirahāt

original: nanu apaśabdānāṃ gavādiṣu gauṇatvameva na vācakatvam,
analyzed: nanu apaśabdānām go ādiṣu gauṇa tvam eva na vācaka tvam
iti atas āha apaśabdānām iti
etena lakṣaṇā api nirastā
tayoḥ artha antara śakti pūrvaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: ato gavyādiśabdebhyo jāyamānasyārthapratyayasya niyamena vārayitumaśakyatvāt arthapratyayābhāve
analyzed: atas gavi ādi śabdebhyaḥ jāyamānasya artha pratyayasya niyamena vārayitum aśakya tvāt artha pratyaya abhāve
ca tad prayogasya eva aprasakteḥ ubhayathā api sādhūn eva iti niyamaḥ na saṃbhavati iti abhipretya

original: yathāca rakṣohāgamaladhvasandehānāṃ vyākaraṇaprayojanakatvamuktaṃ tathā pūrvapakṣe pratipāditaṃ kaustubha eva draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: yathā ca rakṣaḥ hā gamala dhva sandehānām vyākaraṇa prayojanaka tvam uktam tathā pūrvapakṣe pratipāditam kaustubhe eva draṣṭavyam
prayoga utpati aśāstra tvāt śabdeṣu vyavasthā asyāt
smṛti adhikaraṇa nyāyena siddham api vyākaraṇa prāmāṇyam ākṣipyate
niyama dvaya artham hi tat
sādhūn eva prayuñjīta na asādhūn iti ekaḥ
gavā ādayaḥ eva sādhavaḥ na gāvī ādayaḥ iti aparaḥ
na ca niyama dvayasya mūlam sambhavati
pratigo ādi śabdam aneka śruti vākya pāṭha asambhavāt

nahi sādhu tvam nāma artha pratyāyaka tvam

original: ato vācakatvāviśeṣānna vyākaraṇena niyamaḥ saṃbhavati iti prāpte --- prayogapratyayayoḥ
analyzed: atas vācaka tva aviśeṣāt na vyākaraṇena niyamaḥ saṃbhavati iti prāpte prayoga pratyayayoḥ
sādhu śabda apabhraṃśa jānām gāvī ādi śabdānām tad śabda upasthāpana dvāra upapatteḥ na vācaka tva kalpanā
aneka śakti kalpanā āpatteḥ
idānīntanānām ca śakti bhramāt tau
na ca ghaṭa kalaśa ādi pada vat vinigamana avirahaḥ
pāṇini ādi praṇīta vyākaraṇasya eva niyāmaka tvāt
na ca nirmūla tvam

original: prayoganiyame “sādhūneva prayuñjīte” tyevaṃvidhāyā ekasyā eva śrutermūlatvāt,
analyzed: prayoga niyame sādhūn eva prayuñjīta iti evaṃvidhāyāḥ ekasyāḥ eva śruteḥ mūla tvāt
sādhu tvam ca anādi vācaka tvam
an apabhraṣṭa tvam vā

pramita vṛttyā ar'tha pratipādaka tvam vā iti kaustubhe eva kṣuṇṇam
na mlecchita vaiityasya viṣaya samarpaṇam
evam ca gāvī ādi śabdānām apaśabdānām apaśabda tva abhāvāt āhitāgniḥ apaśabdam

original: prayujye” tyādayo niṣedhāḥ pārasīkaśabdaviṣayā eva “na mlecchabhāṣāṃ śikṣete” tyādismṛtyekavākyatayā neyāḥ //
analyzed: prayujye tyādayaḥ niṣedhāḥ pārasīka śabda viṣayāḥ eva na mleccha bhāṣām śikṣete ityādi smṛti eka vākya tayā neyāḥ
athavā mantraḥ hīnaḥ svarataḥ iti eka vākya tayā aneyāḥ
mantra viṣaya svara varṇa bhreṣa viṣaya tayā vā neyāḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vācaka tvam vinā api apaśabda prayoga pratyayayoḥ upapatti varṇana pūrvaka sādhu śabda prayoga niyama samarthanam
siddhāntam āha prayoga iti
tad śabda upasthāpana iti
mūla bhūta go śabda upasthāpana dvārā iti arthaḥ
aneka iti
anekeṣu śabdeṣu śakti kalpana vikalpa ādi āpatteḥ iti arthaḥ
prathamatas karaṇa āpāṭava ādinā prayuktāt gāvī śabdāt śrotuḥ prayojya vṛddhasya artha pratyayaḥ
tāvat go śabda upasthāpanena yadā jātaḥ tadānīm eva śrotṛ pārśva sthānām saṃjñā saṃjñi rūpa śakti grahaḥ
bhramāt eva jātaḥ tathā eva anyeṣām api idānīntanānām iti na prayoga pratyaya anyathā anupapattyā
vācaka tva kalpanam iti arthaḥ

original: asādhuśabdaprayoganiṣedhasya pratyakṣata evopalambhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt tatra kalpanāprayojanābhāvamarthādeva
analyzed: asādhu śabda prayoga niṣedhasya pratyakṣataḥ eva upalambhasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tatra kalpanā prayojana abhāvam arthāt eva
vā tat siddham abhipretya sādhu prayoga mūla bhūta śruti kalpanām eva darśayati prayoga iti
pārthasārathi ukta sādhu tva nirvacanam tatra prakāśa kārāṇām vyākhyānam dala prayojanam ca
prathamatas pārthasārathi uktam sādhu tva nirvacanam āha anādi iti
atra prakāśa kārāḥ ittham tad lakṣaṇa artham āhuḥ harikārikāyām anapabhraṣṭa tā anādiḥ yat vā abhyudaya yogya tā
vyākriyā avyañjanīyā vā jātiḥ kā api iha sādhu tā
iti nirvacanam tredhā kṛtam

original: tatrādṛṣṭasādhanatvapakṣau vihāya haradattena --- “anidaṃprathamāḥ śabdāḥ sādhavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: tatra adṛṣṭa sādhana tva pakṣau vihāya haradattena anidaṃprathamāḥ śabdāḥ sādhavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
te eva śakti vaikalya pramāda alasa tā ādibhiḥ
anyathā uccaritāḥ puṃbhiḥ apaśabdāḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: ” iti prathamapakṣasyaiva vistareṇokteḥ sa evādṛtaḥ pārthasārathinā /

harikārikāyām api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva darśanāt ca itarayaḥ atra vā śabda prayogāt ca

atas anādi tva praveśaḥ

original: taduktaṃ haradattena --- “yāstvetāḥ svecchayā saṃjñāḥ kriyante ṭighubhādayaḥ /

original: kathaṃ nu tāsāṃ sādhutvaṃ naiva tāḥ sādhavo matāḥ /

anādi tva mātra uktau anarthaka eka varṇa samudāye ativyāptam iti an apa bhraṣṭa pada upādānam

original: nanu --- anapabhraṣṭatvaṃ atra yadyanādiryaḥ śabdaḥ sa ca pratyāyaka iti sādhutvalakṣaṇārthe
analyzed: nanu anapabhraṣṭa tvam atra yadi anādiḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ sa ca pratyāyakaḥ iti sādhu tva lakṣaṇa arthe
kriyamāṇe yadi api nāma karaṇa saṃketite rudra ādi śabde anādi śabda tvāt apatya rūpa artha pratyāyaka tvāt lakṣaṇa samāveśa saṃbhavaḥ
tathā api goṇī śabdasya āvapana vācinaḥ anādi tvāt go rūpa artha pratyāyaka tvāt ca gavi sādhu tva āpattiḥ

original: ucyate; nāmakaraṇavidhinānādireva putratvopādhinā saṃketitaḥ kartavyatayā vihitaḥ iti tena sāmānyopādhinānādyeva putrādipratyāyakatvaṃ rudrādiśabdānāmiti  #
analyzed: ucyate nāma karaṇa vidhi nānā ādiḥ eva putra tva upādhinā saṃketitaḥ kartavya tayā vihitaḥ iti tena sāmānya upādhi nānā ādi eva putra ādi pratyāyaka tvam rudra ādi śabdānām iti

original: ato yadarthapratyāyakatvamanādi sa tatrārthe sādhuriti yuktam lakṣaṇamiti //
analyzed: atas yat artha pratyāyaka tvam anādi sa tatra arthe sādhuḥ iti yuktam lakṣaṇam iti

atrā idam avadheyam yadi artha pratyāyaka tvam śaktyā ucyate
tadā gaṅgā agni padayoḥ tīra māṇavakayoḥ asādhu tva āpattiḥ

original: naca asmanmate śakyārthasyaiva tīrādyupasthāpakatvāt gaṅgādipadānāṃ tīrādipravāhavācakatvenaiva tīrādau sādhutvamiti prakāśakāroktaṃ yuktam;
analyzed: naca asmad mate śakya arthasya eva tīra ādi upasthāpaka tvāt gaṅgā ādi padānām tīra ādi pravāha vācaka tvena eva tīra ādau sādhu tvam iti prakāśakāra uktam yuktam
tatra yadi śakya artha pratyāyaka tvam eva vācyam
tāvatā api anādi pada upādāna vaiyarthyam
ṭi ghubha ādi saṃjñāsu śakteḥ eva abhāvena śakya artha pratyāyaka tva mātreṇa nirākaraṇa upapatteḥ
sa ādi śakti svīkāre ca sādhu tvasya api āpatteḥ ca
anyathā arthavat tva abhāvena prātipadika saṃjñā abhāvāt ṭeḥ ityādi ṣaṣṭhī anāpatteḥ
yat tu ṭeḥ ityādīnām śabda anukāra tva aṅgīkāreṇa sādhu tvam aṅgīkṛtya
śabdasya eva lopa ādi kārya anvaya āpattim āśaṅkya śabda parasya eva lakṣaṇayā ar'tha paratvam yat uktam

original: tatsvayameva pūrvaṃ sādhutvānaṅgīkārāt pūrvāparaviruddhatvāt śabdaparatvasyāpi anāditvābhāvādvedokta
analyzed: tat svayam eva pūrvam sādhutva anaṅgīkārāt pūrva apara viruddha tvāt śabda paratvasya api anādi tva abhāvāt veda ukta
helayaḥ ityādi śabdānām anukaraṇa tva aṅgīkāreṇa sādhu tvena svayam aṅgīkṛtānām anādi artha pratyāyaka tva abhāvāt ca
lakṣaṇasya avyāpteḥ ca ayuktam
vastutas tu vṛtti graha abhāve ṭi ghubha ādīnām artha bodhaka tva anupapatteḥ vṛttau api ca
lakṣaṇā gauṇyoḥ śakya pūrvaka tvena asaṃbhavāt saṃketa tvena ca gāvī ādi śabda vat śabda upasthāpanena
śakti bhrameṇa vā bodhaka tva anupapatteḥ avaśya kalpyāyām śaktau śabda viṣaya śakti svīkāreṇa

original: arthaparatvameva yuktamiti tatrānādyarthapratyāyakatvābhāvāt durupapādameva sādhutvamityanādipadopādānaṃ vyarthameva /
analyzed: artha paratvam eva yuktam iti tatra anādi artha pratyāyaka tva abhāvāt durupapādam eva sādhu tvam iti anādi pada upādānam vyartham eva
atas anādiḥ iti bhinnam lakṣaṇam
aparam ca anapabhraṣṭa tā iti lakṣaṇam
na tu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ
ataeva śāstradīpikāyām sarva kāla vṛtti tvam eva ca anādi tvam sādhu tvam
tat ca avicchinna pāraṃparyāt abhiyukta smaraṇena sulabham iti uktam iti mūla grantha virodhaḥ
api iti abhipretya hari kārikā gata anapabhraṣṭa tā padasya yayā aśruta artha paratvam eva aṅgīkṛtya
dvitīyam lakṣaṇam āha

original: (dvitīyalakṣaṇāsvārasyena tṛtīyaṃ tadasvārasyena tṛtīyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ nirvakti)

idam api hum ādi anarthaka varṇeṣu ativyāptam
atas lakṣaṇa antaram āha vyākaraṇa iti

original: atrāpi na gavādiśabdeṣvevānugatāgāvyādiśabdebhyo vyāvṛttā sādhutvaṃ nāma jātiḥ saṃbhavati;

analyzed: sādhu tva ādi jāteḥ api asaṃbhavaḥ evā iti ayuktam lakṣaṇam matvā nyāyasudhākāra uktam lakṣaṇa antaram āha
pramita vṛttyā iti

analyzed: yat tu atra prakāśakāraiḥ na śakti ādi anugatam vṛtti tvam nāma kiñcid śakyate nirvaktum iti dūṣaṇam dattam

original: tat śaktilakṣaṇāgauṇīṣu vṛttipadasya śāstrakāraiḥ saṃketitasyaiva laghunopāyena lakṣaṇe praveśānnirvacane prayojanābhāvādayuktam /
analyzed: tat śakti lakṣaṇā gauṇīṣu vṛtti padasya śāstra kāraiḥ saṃketitasya eva laghunā upāyena lakṣaṇe praveśāt nirvacane prayojana abhāvāt ayuktam

original: tat “dvādaśe 'hani pitā nāma kuryādi“ti sāmānyavidhinā putratvopādhinā sarveṣāṃ devadattaśabdādīnāṃ saṃketakaraṇena śakteḥ pramitatvādayuktam

iti

parihṛtam etat ācāryaiḥ

original: iha tu svābhiprāyaprakāśanadvārār'thajñāpanarūpaṃ bhāṣaṇamuddiśya sādhuniyamavidhau ca na maune doṣaḥ /

original: tatroddeśyābhāvādeva vidhyapravṛttermaunavyāvartanāt yatrāpi bhojanādau vaidhaṃ maunaṃ,
analyzed: tatra uddeśya abhāvāt eva vidhi apravṛtteḥ mauna vyāvartanāt yatra api bhojana ādau vaidham maunam

original: athavā --- sāmānyaviśeṣanyāyānmaunavidhinaiva sādhubhāṣaṇavidherbādhāttatphalī- bhūtākṣinikocādivyāvṛtterapi bādhānna śiṣṭācāravirodho 'pi

original: upakrame ca “he araya” iti prayojye rephasthāne lakāraprayogeṇa “haihe prayoge haihayoḥ”
