iti etad sūtra vihita pluta a prayogeṇa pluta pragṛhyāḥ a ci nityam iti vihita prakṛti bhāva abhāvāt ca
iti asura kṛta nivid apaśabda bhāṣaṇasya parābhava rūpa aniṣṭa hetu tva avagateḥ atas
eva apaśabda tvena eva upasaṃhāra pratīteḥ na mleccha bhāṣā paratvam iti bhāvaḥ
apaśabda bhāṣaṇa niṣedhasya kratu artha tva upapādanam
jyotiṣṭome pratinidhi tayā api apaśabda niṣedha upapādanam ca
nanu katham kratu artha tayā apaśabda bhāṣaṇa niṣedhaḥ
apaśabda bhāṣaṇasya puruṣa artha tvena tad viṣayaka niṣedhasya niṣedhya samāna arthaka tvasya yukta tvāt
iti atas āha ayam ca iti
na anṛtam vadait iti prakaraṇāt jyotiṣṭoma aṅgam
strayu pāya māṃsa bhakṣa ādi puruṣa artham api śritaḥ

original: pratiṣedhaḥ kratoraṅgamiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇāśrayāt” itivārtikoktarītyā yadarthā kriyā tadartho niṣedha iti niyamasyautsargikatvāt na doṣa ityarthaḥ
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ kratoḥ aṅgam iṣṭaḥ prakaraṇa āśrayāt iti vārtika ukta rītyā yad arthā kriyā tad arthaḥ niṣedhaḥ iti niyamasya autsargika tvāt na doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva tanniṣedho 'pitu yajñamātra ityāha --- yajñamātrepiceti //
analyzed: na kevalam jyotiṣṭome eva tad niṣedhaḥ api tu yajña mātre iti āha yajña mātre pi ca iti

original: naca --- evaṃ “vāgyogavidduṣyati cāpaśabdairi“ti smṛtyā vācā manasā ca yajño vartata
analyzed: na ca evam vāc yoga vid duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ iti smṛtyā vācā manasā ca yajñaḥ vartata
iti liṅga darśanena vāc yoga śabdasya yajña paratva avasāyāt tad vidaḥ yajña mātrasya apaśabda bhāṣaṇe
doṣaḥ iti artha avagateḥ yajña mātra viṣaya niṣedha parasya yājñe karmaṇi iti mahābhāṣya vacanasya api

original: yajñamātraviṣayatayā pratīteḥ tābhyāmevavidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ itarayajña iva jyotiṣṭome
analyzed: yajña mātra viṣaya tayā pratīteḥ tābhyām eva vidhi niṣedhābhyām itara yajñe iva jyotiṣṭome
api tad ubhaya prāpteḥ viśeṣataḥ niṣedha āmnānam vyartham iti vācyam
niṣedha atikrame yajurveda bhreṣa prāyaścitta prāpti artham ṛtvij yajamāna sādhāraṇyena niṣedha prāpti artham vā tad sārthakya upapatteḥ
athavā sādhu niyamena arthān nivṛttānām api asādhūnām sādhu prayoga asaṃbhave avaghāta asaṃbhava

original: iva nakhadalanādeḥ pratinidhitvena prāptau prasaktāyāṃ tanniṣedhārthaṃ tanniṣedha
analyzed: iva nakha dalana ādeḥ pratinidhi tvena prāptau prasaktāyām tad niṣedha artham tad niṣedha
iti kaustubha darśita rītyā vā sārthakya upapatteḥ ca
asmin ca pakṣe jyotiṣṭome sādhu prayoga asaṃbhave akṣi saṃketa ādeḥ eva pratinidhi tvam
na tu asādhu śabdasya iti api draṣṭavyam
vastutas tu vāc yoga vid iti ayam na svatantraḥ niṣedhaḥ

original: kintu sādhuprayoganiyamenārthādasādhubhāṣaṇanivṛtteḥ “nagire“tivadanuvādamātram “yastu prayuṅkte kuśalo viśeṣe śabdān yathāvadvyavahārakāle
analyzed: kintu sādhu prayoga niyamena arthāt asādhu bhāṣaṇa nivṛtteḥ nagirā iti vat anuvāda mātram yaḥ tu prayuṅkte kuśalaḥ viśeṣe śabdān yathāvat vyavahāra kāle

original: so 'nantamāpnoti phalaṃ paratra ce“ti caraṇatrayavihitasya puruṣārthasya sādhuniyamasyaucityena stutyarthaṃ iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: saḥ anantam āpnoti phalam paratra ca iti caraṇa traya vihitasya puruṣa arthasya sādhu niyamasya aucityena stuti artham iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam

original: etacca “āhitāgnirapaśabdaṃ prayujya sārasvatīmiṣṭiṃ nirvapedi“ti prāyaścittavidhyanyathānupapatti- kalpitāpaśabdaniṣedhasyāpyupalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat ca āhitāgniḥ apaśabdam prayujya sārasvatīm iṣṭim nirvapet iti prāyaścitta vidhi anyathā anupapatti kalpita apaśabda niṣedhasya api upalakṣaṇam
tatra api āhitāgni pada upādānāt tad sādhya kratu mātra prasakta apaśabda prayoge prāyaścitta vidhānāt niṣedhasya yajña mātra para tvam avasīyate
puruṣa artha tayā apaśabda bhāṣaṇa niṣedhaḥ iti prakāśakāra matam tad khaṇḍanam ca
yat tu etasya yajña atirikta vyavahāre puruṣa artha tayā apaśabda bhāṣaṇa niṣedha para tvam prakāśakārāḥ varṇayanti
tasya dūṣaṇam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam

original: ataeva “anyatrāniyama” iti bhāṣyakārīyaṃ vacanaṃ āhitāgnīnāmapi vyavahārakāle harināmakīrtanādapaśabdabhāṣaṇācāro 'nugṛhīto bhavatītyalaṃ vistareṇa
analyzed: ataeva anyatra aniyamaḥ iti bhāṣya kārīyam vacanam āhitāgnīnām api vyavahāra kāle hari nāma kīrtanāt apaśabda bhāṣaṇa ācāraḥ anugṛhītaḥ bhavati iti alam vistareṇa
satyam vadet
na anṛtam vadet iti anayoḥ prayoga niyama mūla tvam iti śāstradīpikā tad vyākhyānayoḥ siddhānta khaṇḍanam
yat tu samyaktva asamyaktva vāci satya anṛta pada upādānāt satyam vadet na anṛtam vadet
iti anayoḥ eva śruti smṛtiṣu śrūyamāṇayoḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ prayoga niyama aṃśe mūla tva upapatteḥ eka upalakṣaṇa asaṃbhavena

original: mūlakalpanānirāse na yukta iti vārtike pakṣāntaramāha --- tadeva śāstradīpikāyāmanusṛtam,
analyzed: mūla kalpanā nirāse na yuktaḥ iti vārtike pakṣa antaram āha tat eva śāstradīpikāyām anusṛtam
tat vadet iti asya artha abhidhāna arthaka tva vat śabda uccāraṇa paratvāt anṛta padasya api artha viṣaye
satya tva paratvāt śabda viṣaye vā apabhraṣṭa tva paratvāt sakṛt śrutasya aneka artha paratva ayogena ubhaya niṣedhaka tva ayogāt

original: pratyuta “eṣa ha vai satyaṃ vadan satye juhotyastamite juhoti udite prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ
analyzed: pratyuta eṣa ha vai satyam vadan satye juhoti astamite juhoti udite prātar prātar anṛtam
te vadanti purā udayāt juhvati ye agnihotram ityādi śruti paryālocanayā ar'tha paratva avasāyāt śabda paratva anupapatteḥ gāvī ādi

original: śabdasya ca śiṣṭairagarhitatvātprauḍhivādamātramiti rāṇake eva vyaktam /
analyzed: śabdasya ca śiṣṭaiḥ agarhita tvāt prauḍhi vāda mātram iti rāṇake eva vyaktam
yat tu somanāthena satya tvam nāma vṛtti ābādhita artha bodhaka tvam

original: tacca gauriyamiti śabde arthasya gorabādhitatvādarthaviṣayaṃ satyatvam,
analyzed: tat ca gauḥ iyam iti śabde arthasya goḥ abādhita tvāt artha viṣayam satya tvam

original: gośabdasya śaktyā pratipādakatvāt śabdaviṣayasatyatvamityubhayamapi niruktarūpeṇa ekasyaiva satyaśabdasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: go śabdasya śaktyā pratipādaka tvāt śabda viṣaya satya tvam iti ubhayam api nirukta rūpeṇa ekasya eva satya śabdasya arthaḥ
gāvī asti iti atra tu artha ābādhe api vṛtteḥ abhāvāt śabda anṛta tvam
artha bādha sthale tu pratipādaka tva sadbhāve api arthasya abādhita tva abhāvāt na atiprasaṅga
iti ubhayam nirukta bodhaka tva abhāvena ekasya eva anṛta śabdasya arthaḥ atas satya anṛta śabdayoḥ
na aneka artha tā āpattiḥ iti uktam

original: tadekarūpeṇāpi pratipāditārthadvayasya yugapadvadanakriyānvayāyogāt kriyāpade anekārthakalpanayā āvṛttyāpatteranivāraṇadupekṣyam //
analyzed: tad eka rūpeṇa api pratipādita artha dvayasya yugapad vadana kriyā anvaya ayogāt kriyā pade aneka artha kalpanayā āvṛtti āpatteḥ anivāraṇa dupekṣyam
apaśabda bhāṣaṇa niṣedhasya kratu artha tā upasaṃhāraḥ

original: evañca “na mlecchabhāṣāṃ śikṣeta” ityādiniṣedhaiḥ mlecchabhāṣāyāḥ puruṣārthatayā
analyzed: evam ca na mleccha bhāṣām śikṣeta ityādi niṣedhaiḥ mleccha bhāṣāyāḥ puruṣa artha tayā
sarvatra niṣedhe pi apaśabda rūpa anya bhāṣā niṣedhasya sarvathā kratu artha tayā eva avagateḥ
vyavahāra kāle tad uccāraṇāt na eva pratyavāyaḥ iti siddham
yajamāna saṃskāra dvārā sākṣāt vā kratu apūrve sādhu prayoga niyama apūrvasya upayogaḥ

original: evaṃ tāvat jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇagataniṣedhasya prakaraṇātkratvarthatve prāpte 'pi jañjabhyamānānuvacananyāyena
analyzed: evam tāvat jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇa gata niṣedhasya prakaraṇāt kratu artha tve prāpte api jañjabhyamāna anuvacana nyāyena
jyotiṣṭoma apūrva sādhanībhūta brāhmaṇa pada upātta yajamāna saṃskāra tva avagateḥ tatra ca yajamānasya eva
tārtīya nyāyena kartṛ tvena saṃskārya tvāt tad artha āpattyā kalpita sādhu niyama vidhi vihita sādhu niyama adṛṣṭasya

original: kratvarthatvāt tajjanyaphalādhānayogyatāsaṃpādanadvārā kratvapūrve upayogāt na vaiyarthyam /
analyzed: kratu artha tvāt tad janya phala ādhāna yogya tā saṃpādana dvārā kratu apūrve upayogāt na vaiyarthyam

original: evaṃ “yājñe karmaṇī“ti mahābhāṣyakāravacanāt yajñamātrāpūrve 'pi upayogānna vaiyarthyam /
analyzed: evam yājñe karmaṇi iti mahābhāṣya kāra vacanāt yajña mātrā pūrve api upayogāt na vaiyarthyam
etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ mahābhāṣya kāra vacane kratu yukta puruṣa vācaka pada upādāna abhāvāt tad saṃskāra tve
pramāṇa abhāvāt anṛta vadana varjanasya eva śuddhakratu dharma tvāt tad kṛta vaiguṇya parihāra artham
ṛtvij yajamāna sādhāraṇyena karma aṅga bhūta vrīhi ādi padārtha vyavahāra artham laukika śabde
prayoktavye vyākaraṇa anugata śabda niyamāt tat janyam yat avaghāta ādi niyama janya adṛṣṭa vat
śuddha kratu artham apūrvam tad aṅga bhūta vrīhi ādi niṣṭham eva kalpyate iti
kratu artha tva vat saṃyoga pṛthaktva nyāyena puruṣa artha tvam api iti nirūpaṇam
etāvatā ca kratu artha tvena niyama adṛṣṭa vaiyarthye parihṛte saṃyoga pṛthaktva nyāyena
puruṣa artha tā aṅgīkaraṇam iti api śabdābhyām sūcayan tad vaiyarthyam parihartum āha sādhu prayoga niyamāt iti

original: “ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ” ityanārabhyādhītavākyena phalasaṃbandhasyāpi bodhanāt tādṛśaphalasyāpūrvaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ śabdaḥ su prayuktaḥ iti an ārabhya adhīta vākyena phala saṃbandhasya api bodhanāt tādṛśa phalasya apūrvam
vinā aniṣpatteḥ tatra ca jyotiṣṭoma sādhya phala upabhoga lakṣaṇa kārya upayogi tvāt vapana ādinā iva
phala ādhāna yogya tā rūpa saṃskārasya sādhu niyamena niṣpatteḥ upayogāt na vaiyarthyam iti arthaḥ
ekaḥ śabdaḥ iti vākya arthasya prakṛta anuguṇasya saṃpādana prakāraḥ

original: atra ca suprayukta ityasya agre śāstrānvaya ityapi paṭhati /
analyzed: atra ca su prayuktaḥ iti asya agre śāstra anvayaḥ iti api paṭhati

original: tena śāstraśabdena rūḍhyā vidyāsthānavācinā vyākaraṇasyaivābhidhānāt vyākaraṇaśāstrānugatasādhuśabdabhāṣaṇaniyamasya svargasādhanatvāvagateḥ  #
analyzed: tena śāstra śabdena rūḍhyā vidyā sthāna vācinā vyākaraṇasya eva abhidhānāt vyākaraṇa śāstra anugata sādhu śabda bhāṣaṇa niyamasya svarga sādhana tva avagateḥ
puruṣa artha tā avasīyate

original: tathāca rāgaprāptaprayogāśritaḥ sādhuniyamo bhojanāśritaḥ prāṅmukhatvaniyama āyuṣyaphala iva svargaphale vidhīyate /
analyzed: tathā ca rāga prāpta prayoga āśritaḥ sādhu niyamaḥ bhojana āśritaḥ prāc mukha tva niyamaḥ āyuṣya phale iva svarga phale vidhīyate

original: tasya cājñātasya śabdasya prayogāśritatvāsaṃbhavādarthaprāptavyākaraṇotthajñānakarmatvasyānuvādakameva samyagjñāta iti padam /
analyzed: tasya ca ajñātasya śabdasya prayoga āśrita tva asaṃbhavāt artha prāpta vyākaraṇa uttha jñāna karma tvasya anuvādakam eva samyak jñātaḥ iti padam

original: evañcātra prayogāśritādeva phalokteḥ jñānamātrādeva dharma iti pakṣo bhāṣyādyukto 'pi abhyupetyavādenaiva neyaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca atra prayoga āśritāt eva phala ukteḥ jñāna mātrāt eva dharmaḥ iti pakṣaḥ bhāṣya ādi uktaḥ api abhyupetyavādena eva neyaḥ
sādhu śabdānām prayoga āśritānām eva phala sādhanatvam na jñāna mātrāt iti asya sopapattikam upapādanam

original: ataeva jñānasya sādhuniyamārthatvena parārthatvājjñānaphalapratipādakānāṃ vacanānāṃ “yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainamevaṃ vede” tivatparṇamayīnyāyenārthavādatvameva
analyzed: ataeva jñānasya sādhu niyama artha tvena parārtha tvāt jñāna phala pratipādakānām vacanānām yaḥ aśvamedhena yajate yaḥ ca enam evam vede tivatparṇamayīnyāyena arthavāda tvam eva
prayogasya rāga prāpta tvena avidheya tvena phala saṃbandha asaṃbhavāt

original: naca bhāṣaṇasyāpyarthajñānārthatvena parārthatvādapāpaślokaśravaṇavat “svarge loke” ityasyāpi arthavādamātratvaṃ śaṅkyam;
analyzed: na ca bhāṣaṇasya api artha jñāna artha tvena parārtha tvāt apāpa śloka śravaṇa vat svarge loke iti asya api arthavāda mātra tvam śaṅkyam
an ārabhya vihitasya bhāṣaṇasya kratu artha tve pramāṇa abhāvena dṛṣṭārtha vyavahāra hetu tvena

original: śuddhapuruṣārthatvāvagateḥ phalākāṅkṣāyāṃ “phalamātreyo nirdeśādi“ti nyāyena phalapratipādakatvopapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: śuddha puruṣa artha tva avagateḥ phala ākāṅkṣāyām phalam ātreyaḥ nirdeśāt iti nyāyena phala pratipādaka tva upapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
rāga prāptasya sādhu prayogasya āśraya tvena anvetum yogyasya upasthāpaka pramāṇa nirūpaṇam

original: nanu evaṃ dṛṣṭārthasya rāgaprāptasya bhojanasyādhikārākhyaprakaraṇena diṅyimāśrayatvasaṃbhave
analyzed: nanu evam dṛṣṭārthasya rāga prāptasya bhojanasya adhikāra ākhya prakaraṇena diṅyimā āśraya tva saṃbhave
api iha tad abhāve upasthiti mātreṇa āśraya tve kriyā antarāṇām api āśraya tva āpattyā su prayukta
iti nitya vat anuvāda anupapattiḥ iti śaṅkām pariharati rāga prāptasya api iti
tasmāt eṣā iti

original: prakṛtipratyayādhānarūpeṇa vyākaraṇena saṃskṛtāyā vāco bhāṣaṇarūpadhātvarthāśrayasaṃbandhavidhānāt bhāṣaṇasyāśrayatvaṃ nāsulabhamityarthaḥ
analyzed: prakṛti pratyaya ādhāna rūpeṇa vyākaraṇena saṃskṛtāyāḥ vācaḥ bhāṣaṇa rūpa dhātvartha āśraya saṃbandha vidhānāt bhāṣaṇasya āśraya tvam na asulabham iti arthaḥ

original: (B1) atra hi prayogāśritaḥ sādhuniyamaḥ phaloddeśena vidhīyate /
analyzed: atra hi prayoga āśritaḥ sādhu niyamaḥ phala uddeśena vidhīyate

original: rāgaprāptasyāpi ca sādhuprayogasya “tasmādeṣā vyākṛtā vāgudyata” iti vacanādāśrayatvasiddhiriti spaṣṭaṃ kaustubhe /
analyzed: rāga prāptasya api ca sādhu prayogasya tasmāt eṣā vyākṛtā vāc udyataḥ iti vacanāt āśraya tva siddhiḥ iti spaṣṭam kaustubhe

original: “gavādaya eva sādhavo na gāvyādaya” iti sādhusvarūpaniyamasya tu anādiprayogaparamparaiva mūlam /
analyzed: gavā ādayaḥ eva sādhavaḥ na gāvī ādayaḥ iti sādhu svarūpa niyamasya tu anādi prayoga paramparā eva mūlam
atas pramāṇam vyākaraṇam

original: yattu nyāyamūlakaṃ sphoṭādi tatrocyate śrutiviruddhaṃ ca,
analyzed: yat tu nyāya mūlakam sphoṭa ādi tatra ucyate śruti viruddham ca
tad nyāya śruti virodhe kāmam bhavatu apramāṇam
iti aṣṭamam vyākaraṇa prāmāṇya adhikaraṇam
atra prāsaṅgika prakāśakāra mata khaṇḍanam
atra prakāśa kāraiḥ asya puruṣa artha bhūta sādhu bhāṣaṇa niyama utpatti vidhi paratvam aṅgīkṛtya ekaḥ śabdaḥ iti asya phala saṃbandha bodhaka tvam iti uktam

original: tadekaḥ śabda ityanenaivobhayasaṃbhavādvaiyarthyāt ananyalabhyāśrayasaṃbandhavidhāyakatayaiva pariharaṇīyatvāt ayuktamiti sūcayituṃ vacanādityuktam
analyzed: tat ekaḥ śabdaḥ iti anena eva ubhaya saṃbhavāt vaiyarthyāt ananya labhya āśraya saṃbandha vidhāyaka tayā eva pariharaṇīya tvāt ayuktam iti sūcayitum vacanāt iti uktam

original: nahyekaḥ śabda ityanena sādhubhāṣaṇaniyamasya svargaphalasādhanatā bodhyate,
analyzed: nahi ekaḥ śabdaḥ iti anena sādhu bhāṣaṇa niyamasya svarga phala sādhana tā bodhyate
apitu su prayuktaḥ kāmadhuk iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prayoga āśrita sādhu śabda niyamasya eva iti sādhu bhāṣaṇa vidheḥ anapekṣaṇāt apekṣita āśraya saṃbandha bodhaka tvam eva
yuktam

original: ata eva śāstradīpikāyāṃ tadāśritaḥ sādhuniyama ityevoktam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva śāstradīpikāyām tad āśritaḥ sādhu niyamaḥ iti eva uktam iti bhāvaḥ
yat tu nyāyasudhākṛtā asya kratu artha tayā vidhāyaka tvam uktam
tat kaustubhe nirastam tatra eva draṣṭavyam
go ādayaḥ eva sādhavaḥ iti atra anādi prayoga paraṃparāyāḥ eva mūla tva nirūpaṇam
anādi prayoga paraṃparā eva iti

original: sādhutvāśrayāṇāṃ śabdānāṃ śrotrapratyakṣasiddhatvāt teṣāṃ pramāṇyaniścaya eva kevalaṃ vyākaraṇādhīna iti tatrāpi vyākaraṇāntaramūlakatvādupapannamevānādisādhusvarūpaniyamajñānam;
analyzed: sādhu tva āśrayāṇām śabdānām śrotra pratyakṣa siddha tvāt teṣām pramāṇya niścayaḥ eva kevalam vyākaraṇa adhīnaḥ iti tatra api vyākaraṇa antara mūlaka tvāt upapannam eva anādi sādhu svarūpa niyama jñānam
caturdaśa mahāvidyā sthāna antargata tvena kalpa ādi vat pravāha nitya tāyāḥ vyākaraṇe api svīkartum yukta tvāt
anyathā tatra api nitya brahmayajña vidhi viṣayatva anupapatteḥ

original: ata eva taittirīyagate “prayājānūyājeṣu vibhaktiḥ kuryā” diti brāhmaṇe vibhaktikaraṇamupapadyate /
analyzed: atas eva taittirīya gate prayāja anūyājeṣu vibhaktiḥ kuryāt iti brāhmaṇe vibhakti karaṇam upapadyate
na ca evam smṛti antara mūlaka tve andha paraṃparā āpattiḥ
adṛṣṭa sādhana tvasya aṣṭaka ādau pratyakṣa aviṣaya tvena andha paraṃparā prāptau api brāhmaṇyām
brāhmaṇāt jātaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti smṛti ukta abhivyañjaka jñāna sahakṛta cakṣuḥ grāhya tvena brāhmaṇa pratyakṣasya iva iha api
pūrva pūrva vyākaraṇa avagata prakṛti pratyaya ādi abhivyañjaka abhyāsa janita saṃskāra sahakṛtena artha jñāna anyathā anupapatti
sahakṛtena ca śrotreṇa ādya yāvat sādhu śabda pratyakṣa upapatteḥ tad aprasakteḥ

original: ato “gavādaya eva sādhava” iti svarūpaniyame 'nādiprayogaparaṃparaiva mūlamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas go ādayaḥ eva sādhavaḥ iti svarūpa niyame anādi prayoga paraṃparā eva mūlam iti bhāvaḥ

original: ato vedāvagatasamyaksādhuśabdaprayogātmakadharmāṅgatvena vyākaraṇaprakriyeti kartavyatayopayujyate iti siddhaṃ vyākaraṇaprāmāṇyamupasaṃharati  #
analyzed: atas veda avagata samyak sādhu śabda prayoga ātmaka dharma aṅga tvena vyākaraṇa prakriyā iti kartavya tayā upayujyate iti siddham vyākaraṇa prāmāṇyam upasaṃharati
atas iti
etat upapādana pūrvakam nyāya viruddha tvena darśitam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
śruti viruddham ca iti
kaleḥ ḍhak vāmadevāt ḍyaḍyau iti anvākhyānayoḥ arthavāda viruddhayoḥ sarva veṣṭana vat ananuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇa aprāmāṇya nirūpaṇam
dṛṣṭam sāma iti adhikāre kaleḥ ḍhak vāmadevāt ḍyaḍyau iti sūtrābhyām kalinā vāmadevena

original: varṣiṇā dṛṣṭaṃ sometyarthe kāleya - vāmadevyaśabdayoḥ sādhutvānvākhyānaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ śrutiviruddham;
analyzed: varṣiṇā dṛṣṭam soma iti arthe kāleya vāmadevya śabdayoḥ sādhu tva anvākhyānam kriyamāṇam śruti viruddham
yat akālayat tat kāleyasya kāleya tvam iti arthavāde sukha svīkāra rūpa kāla prāpti nimitta tvasya kāleya śabde abhidhānāt

original: tathā “āpo vai ṛtviyamārcchantyāsāṃ vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tato vāmaṃ vasu sannyabhavat
analyzed: tathā āpaḥ vai ṛtviyam ārcchanti āsām vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tatas vāmam vasu sat nyabhavat

original: tanmitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatāṃ tāvabrūtāṃ vāmaṃ martyā idaṃ devebhyo 'jani tasmādvāmadevyaṃ”
analyzed: tat mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatām tau abrūtām vāmam martyāḥ idam devebhyaḥ ajani tasmāt vāmadevyam
iti arthavāde vāmadevyaḥ iti samabhivyāhṛta pada dvaya uccāraṇa kriyā nimitta tvasya vāmadevya pade abhidhānāt
atas tat yāvat mūla bhūta śruti darśanam ananuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇa aprāmāṇya viṣayam bhavatu sarva veṣṭana smṛti vat na tu etāvatā sarvasya aprāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ
prayojanam pūrva uttara pakṣa uttham prāk eva darśitam
iti aṣṭamam vyākaraṇa prāmāṇya adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
prayoga codanā

original: vācakaśabdaprasaṅgādvācyaṃ kiṃ ghaṭatvādijātiḥ uta vyaktiriti cintā /
analyzed: vācaka śabda prasaṅgāt vācyam kim ghaṭa tva ādi jātiḥ uta vyaktiḥ iti cintā

original: tadarthaṃ ca lokavedayoḥ śabdānāmanyatvamuta neti cintanīyam /
analyzed: tad artham ca loka vedayoḥ śabdānām anya tvam uta na iti cintanīyam
anya tve hi upāya abhāvena vaidika śabda śakti grahasya asaṃbhavāt na ādyā cintā ārambhaṇīyā

original: ekatve tu loke vṛddhavyavahārānusāreṇa gṛhītā śaktirvede phaliṣyatīti yuktā cintā /
analyzed: ekatve tu loke vṛddha vyavahāra anusāreṇa gṛhītā śaktiḥ vede phaliṣyati iti yuktā cintā
tatra varṇa abhede api svara chāndasa varṇa āgama lopa vikāra anadhyāya ādi dharma bhedāt

original: rasa ityādipadayoriva lokavedayoḥ padānāmanyatvamiti prāpte ----- yatrārthabhedapratipattyanukūlo
analyzed: rasaḥ iti ādi padayoḥ iva loka vedayoḥ padānām anya tvam iti prāpte
dharma bhedaḥ tatra eva pada bhedaḥ
yathā saraḥ rasaḥ iti kramāt
brahma brāhmaṇa iti nyūna atirikta tvāt
sthūla pṛṣatī iti atra karmadhāraya bahuvrīhyoḥ svarāt anta udātta tva ādi udātta tva rūpāt

original: pacate dakṣiṇāṃ dehi bhojanārthaṃ pacate ityatra vyadhikaraṇapadasannidhirūpādvākyāt,
analyzed: pacate dakṣiṇām dehi bhojana artham pacate iti atra vyadhikaraṇa pada sannidhi rūpāt vākyāt

original: yātaḥ punarāyāti yāto devadattayajñadattau ityatra samānādhikaraṇapadasannidhirūpaśrutyā,
analyzed: yātaḥ punar āyāti yātaḥ devadatta yajñadattau iti atra samāna adhikaraṇa pada sannidhi rūpa śrutyā
aśvaḥ iti agamaḥ iti arthe vyākaraṇa smṛtyā
tad ami jñasya pada bheda anubhavāt

original: yatra tu nārthabhedapratītistatra satyapi dharmabhede dṛḍhatarapratyamijñābalenaikatvāvadhāraṇānna padānyatvaṃ lokavedayoriti yuktā ādyā cintā
analyzed: yatra tu nā artha bheda pratītiḥ tatra sati api dharma bhede dṛḍhatara pratyami jñā balena ekatva avadhāraṇāt na pada anyatvam loka vedayoḥ iti yuktā ādyā cintā
ākṛti adhikaraṇa upoddhātasya loka veda adhikaraṇasya ākṛti adhikaraṇa upakrameṇa upakrame nimitta nirūpaṇam

original: lokavedayoḥ śabdānāmanyatvaṃ uta neti vicārārthaṃ lokavedādhikaraṇasya pūrvavyutpāditavyākaraṇaprāmāṇyādhikaraṇenāsaṃgatimabhipretya
analyzed: loka vedayoḥ śabdānām anya tvam uta na iti vicāra artham loka veda adhikaraṇasya pūrva vyutpādita vyākaraṇa prāmāṇya adhikaraṇena asaṃgatim abhipretya
saṅgati lobhena ākṛti adhikaraṇam eva ādau ārambhaṇīyam
tena ca prasaṅga saṅgati upapatteḥ na asaṅgata tā

original: lokavedādhikaraṇaṃ tu tadupoddhātatvena madhye saṃgatamityevaṃ saṅgatiṃ sūcayitumākṛtyadhikaraṇacintāṃ prathamato darśayati --- vācaketi //
analyzed: loka veda adhikaraṇam tu tad upoddhāta tvena madhye saṃgatam iti evam saṅgatim sūcayitum ākṛti adhikaraṇa cintām prathamatas darśayati vācaka iti
prasaṅgāt iti apavāda saṃgateḥ api upalakṣaṇam

original: pūrvaṃ vyākaraṇaprāmāṇyasya sādhitasyeha kātyāyanenokte vyaktivācitvāṃśe 'pi prasaktasyāpavādakaraṇenāpi tadupapatteḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam vyākaraṇa prāmāṇyasya sādhitasya iha kātyāyanena ukte vyakti vāci tva aṃśe api prasaktasya apavāda karaṇena api tad upapatteḥ

original: ata eva pratipadādhikaraṇādirūpopodghātasya prakṛtamanupakramyaiva kṛtasyeveha na karaṇam;
analyzed: atas eva pratipada adhikaraṇa ādi rūpa upodghātasya prakṛtam an upakramya eva kṛtasya iva iha na karaṇam
a saṅgati prasaṅgāt
tatra tu adhyāya ādi tvāt na anantara saṃgati apekṣā iti viśeṣaḥ

original: athavā --- tatra “bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdā” iti bhāvārthādhikaraṇasūtraṃ na kathañcidapi pratipadādhikaraṇe 'pi śakyaṃ yojayitumiti sūcayituṃ  #
analyzed: athavā tatra bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ iti bhāva artha adhikaraṇa sūtram na kathañcid api pratipada adhikaraṇe api śakyam yojayitum iti sūcayitum
prakṛtam an upakramya ārambhaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ
dravya guṇa kriyā vācakānām sarveṣām api udāharaṇa tva nirūpaṇam
ghaṭa tva ādi jātiḥ iti
nahi etāvatā dravya vācakānām eva udāharaṇa tvam iti bhramitavyam
dravya tva avāntara vyāpya ghaṭa tva ādi jāti vat guṇa tva avāntara vyāpya śukla tva ādi jāteḥ api aṅgīkāre bādhaka abhāvāt

original: karmatvāvāntarajātīnāṃ ca jyotiṣṭomatvādīnāṃ śabdāntarādipramāṇagamyatvenābhyāsādhikaraṇe sādhayiṣyamāṇatvāt teṣāmapi guṇakriyāśabdānāmudāharaṇatvopapatteḥ
analyzed: karma tva avāntara jātīnām ca jyotiṣṭoma tva ādīnām śabda antara ādi pramāṇa gamya tvena abhyāsa adhikaraṇe sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt teṣām api guṇa kriyā śabdānām udāharaṇa tva upapatteḥ
evam ākhyāte api prakṛti pratyayayoḥ dhātvartha bhāvanā vāci tve sādhite api tad gata jāti upadhi anyatara dharma vāci tvam
athavā tad upalakṣita vyakti vāci tvam iti vicāra saṃbhavāt udāharaṇa tvam draṣṭavyam
ākṛti adhikaraṇa vicāra upodghātam darśayati tad artham ca iti
śabdānām iti etat arthānām api upalakṣaṇam
vede phaliṣyati iti

original: yadi anyaḥ śabdo bhavettadā laukikaprayogasyārthapratyāyanārthatvena yathākathañcit tātparyādevānyatarārthāvagateḥ saṃbhavena naiva tadviśeṣavācyatvavicārasya  #
analyzed: yadi anyaḥ śabdaḥ bhavet tadā laukika prayogasya artha pratyāyana artha tvena yathā kathañcid tātparyāt eva anyatara artha avagateḥ saṃbhavena nā eva tad viśeṣa vācya tva vicārasya
prayojanam
vede yadi api prayojanam īdṛśam saṃbhavati

original: pūrvapakṣe “yadāhavanīye juhotī“tyatra juhoteritarahomavyaktau padavadāhavanīyasyāpi saṃbandhaḥ śrutyaiva prāpyeteti sāmānyaśāstrasya bādhāprasaktervikalpaḥ
analyzed: pūrvapakṣe yat āhavanīye juhoti iti atra juhoteḥ itara homa vyaktau pada vat āhavanīyasya api saṃbandhaḥ śrutyā eva prāpyeta iti sāmānya śāstrasya bādhā prasakteḥ vikalpaḥ
yadātu etad adhikaraṇa siddhānta yukttyā juhoteḥ hema tva jāti vāci tvena ākṣepāt vyakti bhānam

original: tadā sāmānyaśāstreṇa sādhāraṇyenākṣepāt vyaktibhānepi yāvaddūrasthā padahomavyaktereva “pade juhotī” tyatra juhotinā sāhityākṣepātsāmānyaśāstrabādhānna  #
analyzed: tadā sāmānya śāstreṇa sādhāraṇyena ākṣepāt vyakti bhāne pi yāvat dūra sthā pada homa vyakteḥ eva pade juhoti iti atra juhotinā sāhitya ākṣepāt sāmānya śāstra bādhāt na
vikalpaḥ iti
tathā api yūpam chinatti ityādau loka prasiddha chedana ādi pada samabhivyāhāreṇa yūpa pada śakti grahe pi anyatra

original: vede śaktigrahopāyābhāvāt naitatprayojanaṃ saṃbhavatītyekatve śabdānāṃ sādhite etaccintāphalamiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: vede śakti graha upāya abhāvāt na etat prayojanam saṃbhavati iti ekatve śabdānām sādhite etat cintā phalam iti bhāvaḥ
āhavanīya pada vākyayoḥ sāvakāśa niravakāśa nyāya viṣayatva upapādanena vyakti vāci tve api upapatti nirūpaṇena ukta cintā prayojana antara nirūpaṇam
yadi api etat āhavanīya bādhā bādha rūpam prayojanam ākare abhihitam
tathā api anyatra vyakti vāci tva pakṣe api yat kiñcid prācīnam agnīṣomīyāt tena upāṃśu caranti iti
vākyena sarvanāma upasthāpita tad hyakti viśeṣe vihitasya api upāṃśu tvasya mandram prāyaṇīyāyām iti
vihita mandra svareṇa niravakāśa tayā bādhasya iva iha api sa avakāśa niravakāśa nyāyena tad bādha siddheḥ ayuktam iti
kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
ataeva prayojana antaram svayam vakṣyate
eka tve tu iti tuśabda prayojanam
nanu ekatve api phala upāyayoḥ veda loka viṣayatayā bhinna viṣayatvāt eka aṅga vaikalya aparihāra
iti āśaṅkā loke tat tatpuruṣa gata uccāraṇa bheda vat vede api uccāraṇa mātrasya bhede api
śabda svarūpa bheda abhāvāt ayuktā iti tuśabdena sūcitam
pūrvapakṣam āha tatra iti
varṇa abhede api svara ādi bhedāt pada bheda nirūpaṇam

original: nanu --- tarkapāde “saṃkhyābhāvādi“ti sūtre balavatpratyabhijñānādeva gakārādiśabdabhedaḥ sādhitaḥ,
analyzed: nanu tarka pāde saṃkhyā bhāvāt iti sūtre balavat pratyabhijñānāt eva gakāra ādi śabda bhedaḥ sādhitaḥ

original: tenaiva tadghaṭitapadābhedo 'pi siddha evetyāśaṅkāṃ jarā rājetyādau varṇābhedasya vidyamānatve 'pi tadabhedāprayojakatvena nirasitumabhyupetyavādena  #
analyzed: tena eva tad ghaṭita pada abhedaḥ api siddhaḥ evā iti āśaṅkām jarā rājā ityādau varṇa abhedasya vidyamāna tve api tad abheda aprayojaka tvena nirasitum abhyupetyavādena
varṇa abhede pi iti uktam

original: tataśca tatra yathā dharmabheda eva padabhedaprayojakaḥ,
analyzed: tatas ca tatra yathā dharma bhedaḥ eva pada bheda prayojakaḥ
tathā iha api iti arthaḥ
dharma bhedam eva darśayati svaraḥ iti
vaidikeṣu niyataḥ svaraḥ
devāsaḥ ityādau chāndasaḥ varṇa āgamaḥ
tmanā deveṣu ityādau ātmanā iti ākāra lopaḥ

original: “udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ce“tyādau hakārasya bhakārarūpo vikāraḥ /
analyzed: udgrābham ca nigrābham ca ityādau hakārasya bhakāra rūpaḥ vikāraḥ

original: chāndogyabahvṛcabrāhmaṇayoḥ svarābhāvāt gavādiśabdeṣu cāgamābhāvāt vyāpakaṃ dharmabhedamāha --- anadhyāyādīti //
analyzed: chāndogya bahvṛca brāhmaṇayoḥ svara abhāvāt go ādi śabdeṣu ca āgama abhāvāt vyāpakam dharma bhedam āha anadhyāya ādi iti
anadhyāya padam svādhyāyasya api upalakṣaṇam
svādhyāyaḥ nāma vihita kāle traivarṇikaiḥ upanītaiḥ adhyayanam

original: anadhyayanaṃ ca niṣiddhakāle śūdrādibhiranupanītaiśca anadhyayanam vaidikeṣu na laukikeṣviti dharmabheda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anadhyayanam ca niṣiddha kāle śūdra ādibhiḥ anupanītaiḥ ca anadhyayanam vaidikeṣu na laukikeṣu iti dharma bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadyapi pāṇininā veda iva loke 'pi svarānuśāsanaṃ kṛtam;
analyzed: yadi api pāṇininā vede iva loke api svara anuśāsanam kṛtam

original: tathāpi śiṣṭairloke svaraniyamasyānādarādvacantīvāprayogādeva svaraniyamo 'nāvaśyaka iti dhyeyam /
analyzed: tathā api śiṣṭaiḥ loke svara niyamasya anādarāt vacanti iva aprayogāt eva svara niyamaḥ anāvaśyakaḥ iti dhyeyam
ādi padena guru śuśrūṣā upāsā abhivādana ādeḥ saṃgrahaḥ
pada anya tve saṃjñā adhikaraṇa nyāyena artha bhedasya utsargataḥ prāptim abhipretya pada anya tva mātram upasaṃharati padānām anya tvam iti

original: atra ca siddhānte nārthābhedatadbhedau yadyapi padābhedatadbhedaprayojakatvenābhimatau;
analyzed: atra ca siddhānte na artha abheda tad bhedau yadi api pada abheda tad bheda prayojaka tvena abhimatau
śākhā antara vākyayoḥ artha abhede api bhedāt
akṣa ādi padeḥ atha bhede api pada bheda abhāvāt

original: ator'thabhedapratītyanukūlo yatra dharmabhedaḥ tatra padabheda iti kathanasya nopayogaḥ;
analyzed: atas ṛtha bheda pratīti anukūlaḥ yatra dharma bhedaḥ tatra pada bhedaḥ iti kathanasya na upayogaḥ
tathā api siddhānte pratyabhijñāna apratyabhijñānayoḥ eva bheda abhedayoḥ mukhya hetu tvam
tad paricāyaka tayā prāyika tvena artha abheda tad bhedau upayujyete

original: tatpratipattistu dharmabhedādityabhipretya padabhedaprayojakaṃ darśayituṃ “padāvadhāramopāyān bahūnicchanti sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tad pratipattiḥ tu dharma bhedāt iti abhipretya pada bheda prayojakam darśayitum pada avadhāram opāyān bahūn icchanti sūrayaḥ
krama nyūna atirikta tva svara vākya śruti smṛtīḥ iti vākya adhikaraṇa gata kārikā artham āha yatra iti
krameṇa udāharaṇāni darśayati yathā iti
vilakṣaṇa ānupūrvī rūpa kramāt iti arthaḥ
sthūlapṛṣatīm iti atra iti
atra samāsa bhedena artha dvaya saṃdehe svara rūpa dharma bhedena artha bheda niścayāt pada bhedaḥ
sthūla pṛṣatī iti atra svara bhedāt artha bhedaḥ tatas pada bhedasya ca nirūpaṇam
tathā hi sthūlapṛṣatīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta iti atra karmadhāraya pakṣe atas iti anuvartamāne
samāsasya iti anena sūtreṇa autsargika anta udātta tve vihite anudāttam padam eka varjam iti
sūtreṇa pūrveṣām caturṇām anudāttaḥ syāt

original: tadānīṃ ca pṛṣatīśabdena matvarthalakṣaṇayā tatraiva bindumattvānvayavat sthūlatvasyāpi tatraivānvayāt sthūlā bindumatī ca gauḥ yāgasādhanamityarthaḥ  #
analyzed: tadānīm ca pṛṣatī śabdena matvartha lakṣaṇayā tatra eva bindumat tva anvaya vat sthūla tvasya api tatra eva anvayāt sthūlā bindumatī ca gauḥ yāga sādhanam iti arthaḥ  /
sidhyati

original: bahuvrīhau tu “bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapada“miti sūtrāntareṇa viśeṣasūtreṇa sāmānyavihitāntodāttatvabādhena
analyzed: bahuvrīhau tu bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrva padam iti sūtra antareṇa viśeṣa sūtreṇa sāmānya vihita anta udātta tva bādhena
pūrva padasya prakṛti svara vidhānāt sthūla śabda gata lakāra uttara yakāre udātta svarasya

original: prāpteḥ sthaulyasya pṛṣatsvevānvayāt sthūlabindumatī svataḥ sthūlā vā gauryāgasādhanamiti
analyzed: prāpteḥ sthaulyasya pṛṣatsu eva anvayāt sthūla bindumatī svatas sthūlā vā gauḥ yāga sādhanam iti

original: arthassidhyatīti sandehe lakārottarākārodāttatvapāṭhāt bahuvrīhyanusārisvareṇa arthabhedaniścayātpadabheda ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: arthaḥ sidhyati iti sandehe lakāra uttara ākāra udātta tva pāṭhāt bahuvrīhi anusāri svareṇa artha bheda niścayāt pada bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
karmadhāraya pakṣe prākṛta chāga jāti bādha prayojana nirūpaṇa para prakāśa kāra khaṇḍanam
yat tu atra prakāśa kāraiḥ karmadhāraya pakṣe prākṛta chāga jāti bādhaḥ
bahuvrīhi pakṣe sthala bindumat tā rūpa guṇa mātra vidhānāt na tad bādhaḥ iti prayojana bhedaḥ api uktaḥ

original: sa sthūlapṛṣatīmanaḍvāhīmityevaṃ anaḍvāhīpadayuktasyaiva vākyasya mahābhāṣye nyāyasudhāyāṃ
analyzed: sa sthūla pṛṣatīm anaḍvāhīm iti evam anaḍvāhī pada yuktasya eva vākyasya mahābhāṣye nyāyasudhāyām
ca pāṭhāt ubhaya pakṣe api anaḍvāhī vidhāna āvaśyaka tvena chāga jāti bādha upapatteḥ ayukta
iti kaustubhe vyaktam
vākyāt pada bheda udāharaṇam vākyāt iti
dehi iti pada samabhivyāhārāt ādya vākyena caturthī anta nāmapadatva nirṇayaḥ

original: uttaratra bhojanārthamitipadasamabhivyāhārāt tiṅantapadanirṇayastena tatra samabhivyāhārarūpadharmabhedena arthabhedāt padabheda ityarthaḥ
analyzed: uttaratra bhojana artham iti pada samabhivyāhārāt tiṅanta pada nirṇayaḥ tena tatra samabhivyāhāra rūpa dharma bhedena artha bhedāt pada bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
nyāyasudhākāra darśitam śruti padasya artham āha samāna adhikaraṇa iti
yāti iti ākhyāta pada sāmānādhikaraṇya rūpa dharma bhedena kartṛ niṣṭha prathama anta tvena nāma tva nirṇayena artha bhedāt pada bhedaḥ
evam dvivacana anta devadatta yajñadatta pada sāmānādhikaraṇya rūpa dharma bhedena yātaḥ iti ākhyāta prathama puruṣa dvivacana anta tva nirṇayena artha bhedāt pada bheda
iti arthaḥ
smṛtyā pada bheda udāharaṇam aśvaḥ iti

original: aśvastvaṃ devadattetyatra ṭu o śvi gativṛddhyoriti śvidhātorluṅi “cliluṅi” iti cli
analyzed: aśvaḥ tvam devadatta iti atra gati vṛddhyoḥ iti śvi dhātoḥ luṅi cli luṅi iti cli
tyādinā cleḥ aṅ ādeśe śvayateḥ aḥ iti anena ikārasya akāra ādeśe aṭ āgame kṛte
lokataḥ nirṇīta aśva rūpa artha apekṣayā bhinna artha pratīteḥ aśva vācaka padāt bhedaḥ smṛtyā iti arthaḥ
yadi api aśvaḥ tvam devadatta iti atra samāna adhikaraṇa pada samabhivyāhāra rūpa śrutyā api aśva jātīya vācaka aśva padāt bhedaḥ sidhyati

original: tathāpi tasya gauṇyā vṛttyāpyupapatteḥ madhyamapuruṣaikavacanāntatvena padabhedaniścayaḥ smṛtyadhīna eveti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api tasya gauṇyā vṛttyā api upapatteḥ madhyamapuruṣa eka vacana anta tvena pada bheda niścayaḥ smṛti adhīnaḥ evā iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ padabhedāvagatyupāyān pradarśya tadvyatirekaṃ prakṛte darśayati --- devā devāsa
analyzed: evam pada bheda avagati upāyān pradarśya tad vyatirekam prakṛte darśayati

original: ityādau dṛḍhatarapratyabhijñābādhakānāṃ pūrvoktānāmabhāve pratyabhijñābalāt na padānyatvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ityādau dṛḍhatara pratyabhijñā bādhakānām pūrvoktānām abhāve pratyabhijñā balāt na pada anyatvam iti arthaḥ
upodghātam upasaṃharati iti yuktā iti
niyogena vikalpena ityādi vārtika ādi ukta ananta pakṣa parityāgena śāstradīpikā ādṛta pakṣa traya parityāgena ca jāti vyakti pakṣa dvaya mātreṇa upakrame nimitta nirūpaṇam

original: tatra yadyapi “niyogena vikalpena dve vā saha samuccite /
analyzed: tatra yadi api niyogena vikalpena dve vā saha samuccite
saṃbandhaḥ samudāyaḥ vā viśiṣṭā vā ekayā itarā
gauḥ iti uccārite sapta vastūni pratibhānti naḥ
jātiḥ vyaktiḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ samūhaḥ liṅga kārake

original: saṃkhyā ca saptamī teṣāmaṣṭapakṣīdvayordvayo” rityādinā vārtike 'neke pakṣā uktāḥ /
analyzed: saṃkhyā ca saptamī teṣām aṣṭa pakṣī dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ityādinā vārtike aneke pakṣāḥ uktāḥ
tat sakalam api iha pakṣa sahastrāṇām militā saptaviṃśatiḥ
śatāni ṣaṣ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ ca aparā vastu saptake ityādinā nyāyasudhāyām kṛtam

original: tathāpi ākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktivācitvapakṣanirāsenaiva teṣāṃ sunirasyatvādupādānāśakteśca śāstradīpikāyām ākṛtirvā vyaktirvā ākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktirveti  #
analyzed: tathā api ākṛti viśiṣṭa vyakti vāci tva pakṣa nirāsena eva teṣām su nirasya tvāt upādāna aśakteḥ ca śāstradīpikāyām ākṛtiḥ vā vyaktiḥ vā ākṛti viśiṣṭa vyaktiḥ vā iti
pakṣa trayam prādhānyena darśitam
tatra vyakti vāci tva pakṣe eva ākṛti viśiṣṭa vyakti vāci tva saṃbhavasya svayam upapādanīya tvāt

original: tṛtīyapakṣasyāpi vyarthatāṃ manvāno yathābhāṣyaṃ pakṣadvayameva pradhānamabhipretya
analyzed: tṛtīya pakṣasya api vyartha tām manvānaḥ yathābhāṣyam pakṣa dvayam eva pradhānam abhipretya

original: yadarthamupodghātastadarthaṃ darśayan pūrvopanyastatvāt saṃśayamapradarśyaiva pūrvapakṣamārabhate --- tatreti //
analyzed: yad artham upodghātaḥ tad artham darśayan pūrva upanyasta tvāt saṃśayam a pradarśya eva pūrvapakṣam ārabhate tatra iti

original: (B1) tatrāvaghātādikriyāṇāṃ liṅgakārakasaṅkhyādīnāṃ ca jātāvayogyatvāt gauḥ śukla ityādisamānādhikaraṇanirdeśācca vyaktivācitvameva /
analyzed: tatra avaghāta ādi kriyāṇām liṅga kāraka saṅkhyā ādīnām ca jātau ayogya tvāt gauḥ śuklaḥ ityādi samāna adhikaraṇa nirdeśāt ca vyakti vāci tvam eva
na ca evam jāti bodha anāpattiḥ
lakṣaṇayā tad bodha upapatteḥ
vyakti śakti grahasya eva vā kārya tā avacchedakam jāti viśiṣṭa śābdabodha tvam
atas na doṣaḥ
na ca vinigamanā virahaḥ
tathā hi na śakti grahasya svātantryeṇa kāraṇa tvam
api tu lāghavāt śakya tva ādi sambadhena ghaṭa padavat tā jñānasya eva
tatas ca asmad mate ghaṭa tvam dharmitā avacchedakīkṛtya śakya tva saṃbandhena ghaṭa padavat tā jñānasya

original: ghaṭo ghaṭapadavānityākārakasya viśeṣyatāsambandhena viśiṣṭaśābdabodhatvāvacchinnaṃ prati kāraṇatvam,
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ ghaṭa padavān iti ākārakasya viśeṣyatā sambandhena viśiṣṭa śābdabodha tva avacchinnam prati kāraṇatvam
bhavat mate tu ghaṭa tva tvam dharmitā avacchedakīkṛtya tat vācyam

original: ataśca ghaṭatvatvasya ghaṭetarāvṛttitvādirūpasyānekapadārthaghaṭitasya praveśāt tava kāryakāraṇabhāve gauravaṃ, na mama /
analyzed: atas ca ghaṭa tva tvasya ghaṭa itara avṛtti tva ādi rūpasya aneka padārtha ghaṭitasya praveśāt tava kārya kāraṇa bhāve gauravam na mama
na ca śakya ānantya ādi doṣaḥ
tasya phala mukha tvāt

original: ataśca lāghavāt vyaktāveva śaktirjātiviśiṣṭavyaktau vā natu jātāveveti prāpte --- ( B2)
analyzed: atas ca lāghavāt vyaktau eva śaktiḥ jāti viśiṣṭa vyaktau vā na tu jātau eva iti prāpte
jātau liṅga saṃkhyā kāraka ādi anvaya ayogya tva nirūpaṇam
ayogya tvāt iti
vidhi vākyeṣu vidhīyamāna avaghāta ādi kriyāṇām jātau amūrta tvena ayogya tvam

original: evaṃ “na brāhmaṇī hantavyā” ityādiniṣedheṣvapi jāternityatvena hananāprasakterayogyatvam /
analyzed: evam na brāhmaṇī hantavyā ityādi niṣedheṣu api jāteḥ nitya tvena hanana aprasakteḥ ayogya tvam
evam jāteḥ eka tvena eka tva atirikta dvi tva ādi saṃkhyā anvayāḥ yogya tvam
jāteḥ strī tvena puṃstva anvaya ayogya tvam
amūrta tvāt eva ca kriyā janya phala āśraya tva ādi rūpa karma tva ādi kāraka anvayāḥ yogyatvam iti arthaḥ
vastutas tu stana keśavatī strī syāt lomaśaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ityuktalakṣaṇasya liṅgasya jātāviva vyaktāvapi asaṃbhavastulya itiliṅgānvayāyogyatvamabhyuccayena draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: iti ukta lakṣaṇasya liṅgasya jātau iva vyaktau api asaṃbhavaḥ tulyaḥ iti liṅga anvaya ayogya tvam abhyuccayena draṣṭavyam
gauḥ śuklā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasya vyakti vāci tve eva upapattiḥ
gauḥ śuklaḥ iti

original: śuklādipadānāṃ guṇiparatvājjātau ca guṇāśrayatvāsaṃbhavena gośabdasyaikārthapratipādakatvarūpa- sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteḥ tadanurodhenāpi
analyzed: śukla ādi padānām guṇi paratvāt jātau ca guṇa āśraya tva asaṃbhavena go śabdasya ekārtha pratipādaka tva rūpa sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ tad anurodhena api

original: naca --- gośabdasya gotvaviśiṣṭavācitvāt śuklapadasya śuklaguṇaviśiṣṭaparatvāt viśeṣeṇabhede ca viśiṣṭabhedāt kathaṃ ekārthatvam iti --- vācyam
analyzed: naca go śabdasya go tva viśiṣṭa vāci tvāt śukla padasya śukla guṇa viśiṣṭa paratvāt viśeṣeṇa bhede ca viśiṣṭa bhedāt katham ekārtha tvam iti vācyam
viśeṣaṇa bhede api gauḥ na śukle ti pratīti abhāvena ubhaya viśiṣṭa vyakta aikyam ādāya ekārtha tva upapatteḥ iti
vyakti śaktau api lakṣaṇayā jāti bhāna upapattiḥ yugat vṛtti dvaya virodhena pakṣa antara anusaraṇam ca
lakṣaṇayā iti
na ca vinigamanā virahaḥ

original: pratyuta lāghavenaikasyāṃ jātau śaktikalpanāt vyaktāveva lakṣaṇeti viparītaṃ vinigamakam iti --- vācyam ;
analyzed: pratyuta lāghavena ekasyām jātau śakti kalpanāt vyaktau eva lakṣaṇā iti viparītam vinigamakam iti vācyam

original: jātervyaktiviśeṣaṃ vināpi anyatra vyaktiviśeṣe sattvena vyabhicāritvāt viśeṣaniścāyakatvāsaṃbhavena
analyzed: jāteḥ vyakti viśeṣam vinā api anyatra vyakti viśeṣe sattvena vyabhicāri tvāt viśeṣa niścāyaka tva asaṃbhavena
vyakteḥ avyabhicāreṇa jāti viśeṣa niścāyaka tvena vyakteḥ eva jāti lakṣaṇāyām niyāmaka sattvāt
asmin pakṣe yugapad vṛtti dvaya virodha āpatteḥ aparitoṣāt pakṣa antaram āha vyakti śakti grahasya eva iti
svātantryeṇa kāraṇa tvam iti

original: ghaṭaśaktigrahatvena kāraṇatāyāṃ śakternaiyāyikamate riśvarecchārūpāyā mīmāṃsakamate padārthāntararūpāyā vā kāraṇatāghaṭakatvāttajjñānādeva  #
analyzed: ghaṭa śakti graha tvena kāraṇatāyām śakteḥ naiyāyika mate riśvara icchā rūpāyāḥ mīmāṃsaka mate padārtha antara rūpāyāḥ vā kāraṇatā ghaṭaka tvāt tad jñānāt eva
viśiṣṭa śābda bodha udayaḥ iti vācyam
na ca idam anubhava siddham
tattvena jñāna abhāve api tathāvidha bodhasya anubhava siddha tvāt
atas na svātantryeṇa kāraṇatva nitya rthaḥ
jñānasya eva iti

original: tadāca saṃbandhavidhayā śaktibhāneca śaktitvena rūpeṇābhāne 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: tadā ca saṃbandha vidhayā śakti bhāne ca śakti tvena rūpeṇa ābhāne api na kācid kṣatiḥ
vyaktau eva śaktiḥ iti

original: nanu --- kathaṃ devadattīyaghaṭavyaktau saṃketagrahe sati vyaktyantare prayogaḥ /
analyzed: nanu katham devadattīya ghaṭa vyaktau saṃketa grahe sati vyakti antare prayogaḥ
tathā tu evā paṭa vyaktau api ghaṭa śabda prayoga āpattiḥ
iti ced

original: ghaṭatvasāmānyamupalakṣaṇīkṛtya yā evamākṛtikā gotvajātiviśiṣṭā sā gaurdevadattagauḥ
analyzed: ghaṭa tva sāmānyam upalakṣaṇīkṛtya yā evam ākṛtikā go tva jāti viśiṣṭā sā gauḥ devadatta gauḥ
iti ukte devadatta pada anabhidheyasya api śukla vastra tvasya devadatta pada śakti graha upalakṣaṇa tva vat iha api
anabhidheyasya api go tva ādeḥ upalakṣaṇa tva upapatteḥ
tuṣyatuḥ dujana nyāyena pakṣa antara dhāvanam
yadā tu abhidheyasya eva dharmitā avacchedaka tvam iti niyamaḥ
tadā sandeha koṭau anupanyastam api vārtika ukta tvāt pakṣa antaram āha jāti viśiṣṭa iti
vyakti śakti vādasya śakti ānantya ādi doṣaiḥ khaṇḍanam
na vyakti vāci tvam
ananta vyakti śakti kalpanā āpatteḥ
ekaika vyakti gata jāti rūpa upalakṣaṇa aikye api saindhava ādi pade lavaṇa aśva tva ādinā śakti bhedasya iva iha api
ghaṭa tvasya śakya tā avacchedaka tva abhāvena tad tad vyakti tvasya eva tad avacchedaka tvena
tad bhedasya anivārya tvāt
atha eka vyakti vāci tvam

original: tadāpi ghaṭatvasyātiprasaktatvena śakyatāvacchedakatvānupapatteḥ tadvyaktitvasyaiva śakyatāvacchedatvena tadvyaktiviṣayakasmaraṇābhāve ghaṭapadādanyavyaktibodhānāpattiḥ
analyzed: tadā api ghaṭa tvasya atiprasakta tvena śakyatā avacchedaka tva anupapatteḥ tad vyakti tvasya eva śakyatā avaccheda tvena tad vyakti viṣayaka smaraṇa abhāve ghaṭa padāt anya vyakti bodha anāpattiḥ

original: yadā tu pūrvoktavidhayā tadvyaktitvaṃ dharmitāvacchedakīkṛtya śakyatvasabandhena ghaṭapaṭhavattāniścayasya kāraṇatvaṃ kalpyate,
analyzed: yadā tu pūrva ukta vidhayā tad vyakti tvam dharmitā avacchedakīkṛtya śakya tva sabandhena ghaṭa paṭhavat tā niścayasya kāraṇa tvam kalpyate
yadi api ca śakti ānantyam
tathā api phala mukha tvāt na doṣaḥ

original: tadā tadvyaktitvasya śakyatāvacchedakatvenaikavyaktiśaktigrahe 'pi śakteḥ saṃbandhavidhayā bhānāṅgīkārāttatvena rūpeṇāsmaraṇe 'pi kṣatyabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: tadā tad vyakti tvasya śakyatā avacchedaka tvena eka vyakti śakti grahe api śakteḥ saṃbandha vidhayā bhāna aṅgīkārāt tatvena rūpeṇa asmaraṇe api kṣati abhāvaḥ

original: tathā ghaṭatvasyātiprasaktasyāpi tadvyaktimātreṇa dharmitāvacchedakatvāṅgīkāro nānupapanna ityucyeta,
analyzed: tathā ghaṭa tvasya atiprasaktasya api tad vyakti mātreṇa dharmitā avacchedaka tva aṅgīkāraḥ na anupapannaḥ iti ucyeta
tatra āha ghaṭa tvam iti

original: ghaṭo ghaṭapadavān ityākārasya kāraṇatvaṃ padatvaṃ dharmitāvacchedakīkṛtya śaktatvasaṃbandhena
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ ghaṭa padavān iti ākārasya kāraṇa tvam pada tvam dharmitā avacchedakīkṛtya śakta tva saṃbandhena

original: ghaṭavattāniścayasya vā ghaṭapadaṃ ghaṭavadityākārasya kāraṇatvamityatra vinigamanāviraheṇānantakāryakāraṇabhāvaprasaṅgāt gauravam,
analyzed: ghaṭavattā niścayasya vā ghaṭa padam ghaṭa vat iti ākārasya kāraṇatvam iti atra vinigamana aviraheṇa ananta kārya kāraṇa bhāva prasaṅgāt gauravam

original: asmanmatetu ghaṭapadatvaṃ dharmitāvacchedakīkṛtya śaktatvasambandhena ghaṭatvavattāniścayasyaiva ghaṭapadaṃ ghaṭatvavadityākārakasya kāraṇatvakalpanāllāghavam
analyzed: asmad mate tu ghaṭa pada tvam dharmitā avacchedakīkṛtya śakta tva sambandhena ghaṭa tvavat tā niścayasya eva ghaṭa padam ghaṭa tva vat iti ākārakasya kāraṇatva kalpanāt lāghavam
na ca mama api viparītam āpādayitum śakyam

original: tathāsati ghaṭatvasya dharmitvena svarūpeṇa tasya dharmitvāyogāddharmitāvacchedakatvena ghaṭatvatvapraveśe gauravasya tvayaivoktatvāt /
analyzed: tathā asati ghaṭa tvasya dharmi tvena svarūpeṇa tasya dharmi tva ayogāt dharmitā avacchedaka tvena ghaṭa tva tva praveśe gauravasya tvayā eva ukta tvāt

original: ato na ghaṭatvatvāvacchinnaṃ ghaṭatvaṃ śakyatvasaṃbandhena ghaṭapadavadityākārakaṃ jñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: atas na ghaṭa tva tva avacchinnam ghaṭa tvam śakyatva saṃbandhena ghaṭa pada vat iti ākārakam jñānam kāraṇam
api tu ghaṭa padam śaktatva sambandhena ghaṭa tva vat iti ākārakam eva
jāteḥ svarūpeṇa eva prakāra tva upapattau ghaṭa tva tvasya apraveśāt

original: naca samavāyenaiva jāteḥ svarūpeṇa prakāratā na saṃbandhāntareṇetyatra pramāṇamasti;
analyzed: na ca samavāyena eva jāteḥ sva rūpeṇa prakāra tā na saṃbandha antareṇa iti atra pramāṇam asti
paraiḥ api tathā anabhyugamāt ca

original: ataśca kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi lāghavāt ghaṭatva eva śaktiḥ /
analyzed: atas ca kārya kāraṇa bhāve api lāghavāt ghaṭa tve eva śaktiḥ
śakya anantya ādi ca na asmad mate
atas prathama upasthita tvāt jātau eva śaktiḥ
evam aruṇa ādi śabdeṣu api guṇaḥ eva guṇa tve vā
na tu tad viśiṣṭa dravye
katham tarhi vyakti bodhaḥ
abhedāt uktavidha kāraṇasya jāti guṇa viśiṣṭa vyakti śābdatve eva kāryatā avacchedaka tva svīkārāt vā upapatteḥ
vastutas tu jāti guṇa śabda tvam eva lāghavena kārya tā avacchedakam

original: vyaktistu tṛtīyāntasthale paśunā yajeta aruṇayā krīṇāti ityādau naiva padādbhāsate;
analyzed: vyaktiḥ tu tṛtīyā anta sthale paśunā yajeta aruṇayā krīṇāti ityādau na eva padāt bhāsate
jāti guṇayoḥ eva dravya pariccheda dvārā karaṇa tva upapatteḥ
liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ api pāśa adhikaraṇa nyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyena pārṣṭhikaḥ jāti guṇa saṃbandhaḥ
atas saṃbandha vidhayā eva tatra dravya bodhaḥ
dvitīya anta ādi sthale tu jāti guṇayoḥ karma tva ādi anvaya asaṃbhavāt vyakteḥ lakṣaṇayā bodhaḥ
tasyāḥ eva karma tva ādi anvayaḥ
liṅga saṅkhyā ādi anvayaḥ ca sākṣāt sambandhena eva
sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca vyakti dvārakam iti sarvam sustham

original: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe rathantarādiśabdānāṃ ṛgvācitvādrathantaramuttarayorgāyati ityādau uttarāpadalakṣitottarākārye yonividhānaṃ,
analyzed: prayojanam pūrvapakṣe rathantara ādi śabdānām ṛk vāci tvāt rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati ityādau uttarā pada lakṣita uttarā kārye yoni vidhānam
siddhānte tu gīti atideśaḥ uttarāsu iti vakṣyate

original: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // 3 //
analyzed: iti śrī khaṇḍadeva viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikāyām prathamasya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
guṇe guṇa tu eva iti pakṣa dvaya upapattiḥ guṇa eva iti
yadā jagatī tala vartti aruṇa guṇaḥ upi ekaḥ eva
tadā guṇaḥ eva yadā aruṇa guṇānām bhedaḥ
tadā aneka vṛtti jāteḥ saṃbhavāt guṇa tve vā śaktiḥ iti arthaḥ
jāti vyaktyoḥ abhedena vyakti bodha upapatti ādikam
abhedāt iti

original: yathaiva hi paṭe paṭatvaṃ iha śuklatvamiti pratītyāyutasiddhayorbhedastathā ayaṃ gaurayaṃ śukla ityādipratītyābhedasyāpi tayossiddhiḥ /
analyzed: yathā eva hi paṭe paṭa tvam iha śukla tvam iti pratītya ayuta siddhayoḥ bhedaḥ tathā ayam gauḥ ayam śuklaḥ ityādi pratītyā abhedasya api tayoḥ siddhiḥ
na ca evam vyakti abhede jāteḥ anitya tā āpattiḥ
jāti ātmanā nitya tve api vyakti ātmanā anitya tvasya asmākam api iṣṭatvāt
atas ca ghaṭa ādi padānām jāti vāci tve api vyakti abhedāt jāteḥ jātyā eva vyakti pratīti siddhiḥ
na ca evam abhede vyakteḥ api vācya tā āpatteḥ adhikaraṇa vaiyarthyam
vyakteḥ vācya tve api bheda abheda aṅgīkāreṇa na vyakti ātmanā tat
apitu
tat etat nyāyasudhāyām mukhya tvena upapāditam pakṣam avalaṃbya uktam
jāti śakti jñānasya eva jāti ādi viśiṣṭa śābda tvam kārya tā avacchedakam iti kalpa antaram

original: ye tu abhedāṅgīkāre 'pi śaktijñānarūpakāraṇasya jātiśābdabodhatvavat vyaktiśābdabodhatvasya
analyzed: ye tu abheda aṅgīkāre api śakti jñāna rūpa kāraṇasya jāti śābdabodha tva vat vyakti śābdabodha tvasya
ca vaiśiṣṭya bodha abhāvena nirvikalpaka rūpatā āpatteḥ pūrva ukta ghaṭa tvavat tā jñānasya kāraṇasya

original: ghaṭatvaviśiṣṭaśābdabodhatvaṃ kāryatāvacchedakamaṅgīkṛtyaivaṃ ekayaiva jātiśaktyorubhayorbodha iti vadanti,
analyzed: ghaṭa tva viśiṣṭa śābda bodha tvam kāryatā avacchedakam aṅgīkṛtya evam ekayā eva jāti śaktyoḥ ubhayoḥ bodhaḥ iti vadanti
tad matena pakṣa antaram āha uktavidha iti
asmin ca mate viśeṣya bhūta vyakteḥ eva karaṇa tva ādi dvārā kriyā anvaya āpattyā viśeṣaṇībhūtayoḥ jāti guṇayoḥ tad anāpattiḥ iti

original: saptadaśaśarāve carau nirvāpe jaghanyamuṣṭilopena catussaṃkhyānugraho na sidhyet;
analyzed: saptadaśa śarāve carau nirvāpe jaghanya muṣṭi lopena catur saṃkhyā anugrahaḥ na sidhyet

original: jaghanyasyāpi pradhānatvena muṣṭyanugrahasyaiva nyāyyatvādityasvarasāt pakṣāntaraṃ svamatatvenāha --- vastutastviti //
analyzed: jaghanyasya api pradhāna tvena muṣṭi anugrahasya eva nyāyya tvāt iti asvarasāt pakṣa antaram sva mata tvena āha vastutas tu iti
ekavaca anteṣu bahuvacana ādi anteṣu ca
sāmānādhikaraṇyena iti
karaṇa tva upapatteḥ iti asya anuṣaṅgeṇa tat yojyam

original: tathāca liṅgasaṃkhyayorapi samānapadopāttatvapratyāsattyā sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhena karaṇatva evānvayaḥ /
analyzed: tathāca liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ api samāna pada upātta tva pratyāsattyā sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbandhena karaṇa tve eva anvayaḥ
pārṣṭhikaḥ jāti guṇa saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu --- vyaktiparicchedakatayā pratīyamānayorliṅgasaṃkhyayoranurodhena prātipadike vyaktilakṣaṇaivāstvityāśaṅkānirākaraṇāya pāśādhikaraṇanyāyenetyuktam
analyzed: nanu vyakti paricchedaka tayā pratīyamānayoḥ liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ anurodhena prātipadike vyakti lakṣaṇā eva astu iti āśaṅkā nirākaraṇāya pāśa adhikaraṇa nyāyena iti uktam
tasya ayam arthaḥ

original: yathā guṇabhūtabahutvānvayānurodhena mukhyabhūtapāśaprātipadikotkarṣo vikṛtau pāśamantre nāṅgīkṛtaḥ,
analyzed: yathā guṇa bhūta bahutva anvaya anurodhena mukhya bhūta pāśa prātipadika utkarṣaḥ vikṛtau pāśa mantre na aṅgīkṛtaḥ
tathā nā eva lakṣaṇā yuktā iti

original: yatra tu pārṣṭhiko 'pi dvitvabahutvānvayo jātau bādhitaḥ,
analyzed: yatra tu pārṣṭhikaḥ api dvitva bahutva anvayaḥ jātau bādhitaḥ
tatra āgatyā lakṣita vyaktyā eva saḥ aṅgīkriyatām

original: prakṛte tu ekavacanānte yukta eva jātiguṇābhyāṃ sa iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: prakṛte tu ekavacana ante yuktaḥ eva jāti guṇābhyām saḥ iti bhāvaḥ
dvitīya anta ādi sthale tu iti
ādi padena saṃpradāna tva ādi kāraka antara saṃgrahaḥ
na ca yugapad vṛtti dvaya virodhaḥ

original: śakyārthasya padāntarārthānvayapramiteḥ prāgeva gaṅgāpadasya pravāhopasthityanantaraṃ lakṣaṇāvadihāpi tadaṅgīkāreṇa tasyāprasakteḥ /
analyzed: śakyārthasya pada antara artha anvaya pramiteḥ prāk eva gaṅgā padasya pravāha upasthiti anantaram lakṣaṇā vat iha api tad aṅgīkāreṇa tasya aprasakteḥ

original: ataeva --- anvayapramottaraṃ tasyaiva padasya vṛttyantareṇārthapratyāyakatva eva saḥ iti dhyeyam /
analyzed: ataeva anvaya pramā uttaram tasya eva padasya vṛtti antareṇa artha pratyāyaka tve eva saḥ iti dhyeyam
naca kramika bodha dvaya aṅgīkaraṇe vaiśiṣṭya bodha abhāvena nirvikalpaka rūpa tva āpattiḥ
iṣṭa āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca iti
liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ samāna abhidhāna śrutyā sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbandhena karma tva ādi anvaye sāmānādhikaraṇyam eka vṛtti tvena jñeyam iti arthaḥ

original: evañca lakṣaṇayaiva gauḥ śukla ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattiḥ pariharaṇīyeti draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: evam ca lakṣaṇayā eva gauḥ śuklaḥ ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapattiḥ pariharaṇīyā iti draṣṭavyam

original: ākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktivācitvapakṣastvāvaśyake jātivācyatve vyaktivācitvasyāpi kalpanāyāṃ gauravāpattyā nirasanīyaḥ /
analyzed: ākṛti viśiṣṭa vyakti vāci tva pakṣaḥ tu āvaśyake jāti vācya tve vyakti vāci tvasya api kalpanāyām gaurava āpattyā nirasanīyaḥ
prayojanam iti

original: ṛgvācitvapakṣe ṛco ṛgantare vidhānānupapattyottarāpadena kāryalakṣaṇayā tatsthānāpattyā vidhānaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
analyzed: ṛk vāci tva pakṣe ṛcaḥ ṛc antare vidhāna anupapattyā uttarā padena kārya lakṣaṇayā tad sthāna āpattyā vidhānam pūrva pakṣe

original: siddhānte tu gīteḥ ṛgantare 'pi saṃbhavānna lakṣaṇā kintu tasyātideśa iti yatsaptame vicārayiṣyate tadetadadhikaraṇaprayojanamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: siddhānte tu gīteḥ ṛc antare api saṃbhavāt na lakṣaṇā kintu tasya atideśaḥ iti yat saptame vicārayiṣyate tat etad adhikaraṇa prayojanam iti arthaḥ

original: yattu --- prakāśakāraiḥ “vrīhīn prokṣati” “dadhnā juhotī” tyādau pūrvapakṣe sarvavrīhihomavyaktīnāṃ
analyzed: yat tu prakāśakāraiḥ vrīhīn prokṣati dadhnā juhoti ityādau pūrvapakṣe sarva vrīhi homa vyaktīnām

original: abhidhānāt tatra śrutyā prokṣaṇadadhyāderviniyogāt prakaraṇasannidhibādhena laukikavrīhiṣvapi
analyzed: abhidhānāt tatra śrutyā prokṣaṇa dadhi ādeḥ viniyogāt prakaraṇa sannidhi bādhena laukika vrīhiṣu api

original: prokṣaṇaṃ homāntare ca dadhi syāt pūrvapakṣe,
analyzed: prokṣaṇam homa antare ca dadhi syāt pūrvapakṣe

original: siddhānte tu śabdārthabhūtāyā vrīhitvahomatvajāteḥ prākṛtavrīhihomayorapi paryāptisattvāt prakaraṇasannidhyanugrahe 'pi na kācicchrutipīḍeti  #
analyzed: siddhānte tu śabda artha bhūtāyāḥ vrīhi tva homa tva jāteḥ prākṛta vrīhi homayoḥ api paryāpti sattvāt prakaraṇa sannidhi anugrahe api na kācid śruti pīḍā iti
prakṛteṣu eva iti
tat siddhānte api prakṛta vrīhi homa atirikta vyaktiṣu api tad jāti paryāpti sattvena anivāraṇāt
sarvaiḥ ca vyavahāra asaṃbhavena ānarthakya parihāra artham prakaraṇa ādi ālocanā āvaśyaka tvena

original: tena prakṛtātiriktānāṃ nivāraṇavat pūrvapakṣe 'pi tatsaṃbhavena viśeṣābhāvāt dvitīyādisthale
analyzed: tena prakṛta atiriktānām nivāraṇa vat pūrvapakṣe api tad saṃbhavena viśeṣa abhāvāt dvitīya ādi sthale
lakṣaṇayā sarva vyakti bhānasya upapādanīya tvena doṣa tādavasthyāt ca ayuktam iti upekṣitam pūjya pādaiḥ
iti navamam ākṛti adhikaraṇam
iti śrīkhaṇḍa deva antevāsika vimaṇḍana śaṃbhu bhaṭṭa viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikā prabhāvalyām prathamasya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
